45bool ItemInterface::hasItemForTotemCategory(uint32_t totemCategory)
46{
47 // If totem category is 0, the spell does not require any totems or tools
48 if (totemCategory == 0)
49 return true;
50
51#if VERSION_STRING == Classic
52 return false;
53#else
54 const auto spellTotemCategory = sTotemCategoryStore.lookupEntry(totemCategory);
55 if (spellTotemCategory == nullptr)
56 return false;
57
58 // Helper lambda
59 auto checkItem = [&](Item const* item) -> bool
60 {
61 if (item == nullptr)
62 return false;
63 // Item has no totem category
64 if (item->getItemProperties()->TotemCategory == 0)
65 return false;
66 const auto itemTotemCategory = sTotemCategoryStore.lookupEntry(item->getItemProperties()->TotemCategory);
67 // Item has invalid totem category
68 if (itemTotemCategory == nullptr)
69 return false;
70 // Totem category types do not match
71 if (spellTotemCategory->categoryType != itemTotemCategory->categoryType)
72 return false;
73 // Check if totem category masks match
74 if (itemTotemCategory->categoryMask & spellTotemCategory->categoryMask)
75 return true;
76 return false;
77 };
78
79 for (int16_t i = EQUIPMENT_SLOT_START; i < EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END; ++i)
80 {
81 if (checkItem(GetInventoryItem(i)))
82 return true;
83 }
84
85 for (int8_t i = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
86 {
87 // Get bag from bag slot
88 const auto container = GetContainer(i);
89 if (container == nullptr)
90 continue;
91 // Loop through bag's content
92 for (uint16_t j = 0; j < container->getSlotCount(); ++j)
93 {
94 if (checkItem(container->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(j))))
95 return true;
96 }
97 }
98
99 for (int16_t i = INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
100 {
101 if (checkItem(GetInventoryItem(i)))
102 return true;
103 }
104
105 for (int16_t i = INVENTORY_KEYRING_START; i < CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_END; ++i)
106 {
107 if (checkItem(GetInventoryItem(i)))
108 return true;
109 }
110
111 return false;
112#endif
113}
114
115bool ItemInterface::isItemInTradeWindow(Item const* item) const
116{
117 if (item == nullptr || item->getOwner() == nullptr)
118 return false;
119
120 if (item->getOwner()->getTradeData() == nullptr)
121 return false;
122
123 return item->getOwner()->getTradeData()->hasTradeItem(item->getGuid());
124}
125
126void ItemInterface::addTemporaryEnchantedItem(Item* item, EnchantmentSlot slot)
127{
128 std::unique_lock<std::mutex> guard(m_temporaryEnchantmentMutex);
129 ItemEnchantmentDuration enchantment;
130 enchantment.item = item;
131 enchantment.slot = slot;
132 enchantment.timeLeft = item->getEnchantmentDuration(slot);
133 m_temporaryEnchantmentList.push_back(enchantment);
134}
135
136void ItemInterface::removeTemporaryEnchantedItem(Item* item)
137{
138 std::unique_lock<std::mutex> guard(m_temporaryEnchantmentMutex);
139 for (auto itr = m_temporaryEnchantmentList.cbegin(); itr != m_temporaryEnchantmentList.cend();)
140 {
141 if ((*itr).item == item)
142 itr = m_temporaryEnchantmentList.erase(itr);
143 else
144 ++itr;
145 }
146}
147
148void ItemInterface::removeTemporaryEnchantedItem(Item* item, EnchantmentSlot slot)
149{
150 std::unique_lock<std::mutex> guard(m_temporaryEnchantmentMutex);
151 for (auto itr = m_temporaryEnchantmentList.cbegin(); itr != m_temporaryEnchantmentList.cend();)
152 {
153 if ((*itr).item == item && (*itr).slot == slot)
154 itr = m_temporaryEnchantmentList.erase(itr);
155 else
156 ++itr;
157 }
158}
159
160void ItemInterface::sendEnchantDurations(Item const* forItem/* = nullptr*/)
161{
162 std::unique_lock<std::mutex> guard(m_temporaryEnchantmentMutex);
163 for (const auto& itr : m_temporaryEnchantmentList)
164 {
165 if (forItem != nullptr && itr.item != forItem)
166 continue;
167
168 itr.item->setEnchantmentDuration(itr.slot, itr.timeLeft);
169 itr.item->sendEnchantTimeUpdate(itr.slot, itr.timeLeft / 1000);
170 itr.item->m_isDirty = true;
171 }
172}
173
174void ItemInterface::updateEnchantDurations(uint32_t timePassed)
175{
176 std::unique_lock<std::mutex> guard(m_temporaryEnchantmentMutex);
177 for (auto itr = m_temporaryEnchantmentList.begin(); itr != m_temporaryEnchantmentList.end();)
178 {
179 if (timePassed >= (*itr).timeLeft)
180 {
181 // Enchantment has expired
182 (*itr).item->removeEnchantment((*itr).slot, true);
183 itr = m_temporaryEnchantmentList.erase(itr);
184 }
185 else
186 {
187 (*itr).timeLeft -= timePassed;
188 ++itr;
189 }
190 }
191}
192
193#if VERSION_STRING >= WotLK
194void ItemInterface::updateSoulboundTradeItems()
195{
196 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(m_soulboundTradeableMutex);
197 if (m_soulboundTradeableList.empty())
198 return;
199
200 for (auto itemSoulbound = m_soulboundTradeableList.cbegin(); itemSoulbound != m_soulboundTradeableList.cend();)
201 {
202 if (!(*itemSoulbound)->m_isDirty)
203 {
204 if ((*itemSoulbound)->getOwner()->getGuid() != m_pOwner->getGuid())
205 {
206 itemSoulbound = m_soulboundTradeableList.erase(itemSoulbound);
207 continue;
208 }
209 if ((*itemSoulbound)->checkSoulboundTradeExpire())
210 {
211 itemSoulbound = m_soulboundTradeableList.erase(itemSoulbound);
212 continue;
213 }
214 ++itemSoulbound;
215 }
216 else
217 {
218 itemSoulbound = m_soulboundTradeableList.erase(itemSoulbound);
219 }
220 }
221}
222
223void ItemInterface::addTradeableItem(Item* item)
224{
225 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(m_soulboundTradeableMutex);
226 m_soulboundTradeableList.push_back(item);
227}
228
229void ItemInterface::removeTradeableItem(Item* item)
230{
231 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(m_soulboundTradeableMutex);
232 m_soulboundTradeableList.remove(item);
233}
234#endif

236void ItemInterface::buildInventoryChangeError(Item const* srcItem, Item const* dstItem, uint8_t inventoryError, uint32_t srcItemId/* = 0*/)
237{
238 uint64_t srcGuid = 0;
239 uint64_t destGuid = 0;
240 uint32_t extraData = 0;
241 auto sendExtraData = false;
242
243 if (srcItem != nullptr)
244 srcGuid = srcItem->getGuid();
245
246 if (dstItem != nullptr)
247 destGuid = dstItem->getGuid();
248
249 const auto itemProperties = srcItem != nullptr ? srcItem->getItemProperties() : sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(srcItemId);
250 switch (inventoryError)
251 {
252 case INV_ERR_YOU_MUST_REACH_LEVEL_N:
253 case INV_ERR_PURCHASE_LEVEL_TOO_LOW:
254 {
255 extraData = itemProperties != nullptr ? itemProperties->RequiredLevel : 0;
256 sendExtraData = true;
257 } break;
258 case INV_ERR_ITEM_MAX_LIMIT_CATEGORY_COUNT_EXCEEDED:
259 case INV_ERR_ITEM_MAX_LIMIT_CATEGORY_SOCKETED_EXCEEDED:
260 case INV_ERR_ITEM_MAX_LIMIT_CATEGORY_EQUIPPED_EXCEEDED:
261 {
262 extraData = itemProperties != nullptr ? itemProperties->ItemLimitCategory : 0;
263 sendExtraData = true;
264 } break;
265 default:
266 break;
267 }
268
269 m_pOwner->sendPacket(SmsgInventoryChangeFailure(inventoryError, srcGuid, destGuid, extraData, sendExtraData).serialise().get());
270}
271
272void ItemInterface::setOwnerInventoryItem(uint8_t slot, uint64_t guid)
273{
274 if (slot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END)
275 m_pOwner->setInventorySlotItemGuid(slot, guid);
276 else if (slot < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END)
277 m_pOwner->setPackSlotItemGuid(slot - INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_START, guid);
278 else if (slot < BANK_SLOT_ITEM_END)
279 m_pOwner->setBankSlotItemGuid(slot - BANK_SLOT_ITEM_START, guid);
280 else if (slot < BANK_SLOT_BAG_END)
281 m_pOwner->setBankBagSlotItemGuid(slot - BANK_SLOT_BAG_START, guid);
282 else if (slot < BUYBACK_SLOT_END)
283 m_pOwner->setVendorBuybackSlot(slot - BUYBACK_SLOT_START, guid);
284#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
285 else if (slot < INVENTORY_KEYRING_END)
286 m_pOwner->setKeyRingSlotItemGuid(slot - INVENTORY_KEYRING_START, guid);
287#endif
288#if VERSION_STRING == TBC
289 else if (slot < (INVENTORY_KEYRING_END + WOWPLAYER_VANITY_PET_SLOT_COUNT))
290 m_pOwner->setVanityPetSlotItemGuid(slot - INVENTORY_KEYRING_END, guid);
291#elif VERSION_STRING == WotLK
292 else if (slot < CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_END)
293 m_pOwner->setCurrencyTokenSlotItemGuid(slot - CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_START, guid);
294#endif
295}
296
297void ItemInterface::update(uint32_t timePassed)
298{
299 // Update enchantment durations
300 updateEnchantDurations(timePassed);
301
302#if VERSION_STRING >= WotLK
303 // Retradeable soulbound items
304 updateSoulboundTradeItems();
305#endif
306
307 // todo: add items with duration also here
308}

313ItemInterface::ItemInterface(Player* pPlayer) : m_EquipmentSets(pPlayer->getGuidLow())
314{
315 m_pOwner = pPlayer;
316 std::fill(m_pItems.begin(), m_pItems.end(), nullptr);
317 std::fill(m_pBuyBack.begin(), m_pBuyBack.end(), nullptr);
318 m_refundableitems.clear();
319
320}
321
322ItemInterface::~ItemInterface()
323{
324 // Free the memory explicitly here to prevent crash on logout -Appled
325 std::fill(m_pItems.begin(), m_pItems.end(), nullptr);
326 std::fill(m_pBuyBack.begin(), m_pBuyBack.end(), nullptr);
327 this->m_refundableitems.clear();
328}

330uint32_t ItemInterface::m_CreateForPlayer(ByteBuffer* data) // 100%
331{
332 uint32_t count = 0;
333
334 if (m_pOwner)
335 {
336 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_INVENTORY_SLOT; ++i)
337 {
338 if (m_pItems[i])
339 {
340 if (m_pItems[i]->isContainer())
341 {
342 count += m_pItems[i]->buildCreateUpdateBlockForPlayer(data, m_pOwner);
343
344 for (uint32_t e = 0; e < m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++e)
345 {
346 Item* pItem = static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[i].get())->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(e));
347 if (pItem)
348 count += pItem->buildCreateUpdateBlockForPlayer(data, m_pOwner);
349 }
350 }
351 else
352 {
353 count += m_pItems[i]->buildCreateUpdateBlockForPlayer(data, m_pOwner);
354 }
355 }
356 }
357 }
358 else
359 {
360 sLogger.failure("No Owner for ItemInterface::m_CreateForPlayer");
361 }
362 return count;
363}
364
365void ItemInterface::m_DestroyForPlayer() // 100%
366{
367 if (m_pOwner)
368 {
369 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_INVENTORY_SLOT; ++i)
370 {
371 if (m_pItems[i])
372 {
373 if (m_pItems[i]->isContainer())
374 {
375 for (uint32_t e = 0; e < m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++e)
376 {
377 Item* pItem = static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[i].get())->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(e));
378 if (pItem)
379 {
380 m_pOwner->sendDestroyObjectPacket(pItem->getGuid());
381 }
382 }
383 m_pOwner->sendDestroyObjectPacket(m_pItems[i]->getGuid());
384 }
385 else
386 {
387 m_pOwner->sendDestroyObjectPacket(m_pItems[i]->getGuid());
388 }
389 }
390 }
391 }
392 else
393 {
394 sLogger.failure("Tried to destroy owner item without an owner ItemInterface::m_DestroyForPlayer");
395 }
396}

398/// Creates and adds a item that can be manipulated after
399Item* ItemInterface::SafeAddItem(uint32_t ItemId, int8_t ContainerSlot, int16_t slot)
400{
401 ItemProperties const* pProto = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(ItemId);
402 if (!pProto)
403 return nullptr;
404
405 if (pProto->InventoryType == INVTYPE_BAG)
406 {
407 std::unique_ptr<Item> itemHolder = std::make_unique<Container>(HIGHGUID_TYPE_CONTAINER, sObjectMgr.generateLowGuid(HIGHGUID_TYPE_CONTAINER));
408 static_cast<Container*>(itemHolder.get())->create(ItemId, m_pOwner);
409 auto* pItem = itemHolder.get();
410 const auto [result, _] = m_AddItem(std::move(itemHolder), ContainerSlot, slot);
411 if (result)
412 {
413 return pItem;
414 }
415 else
416 {
417 return nullptr;
418 }
419 }
420 else
421 {
422 auto itemHolder = std::make_unique<Item>();
423 itemHolder->init(HIGHGUID_TYPE_ITEM, sObjectMgr.generateLowGuid(HIGHGUID_TYPE_ITEM));
424 itemHolder->create(ItemId, m_pOwner);
425 auto* pItem = itemHolder.get();
426 const auto [result, _] = m_AddItem(std::move(itemHolder), ContainerSlot, slot);
427 if (result)
428 {
429 return pItem;
430 }
431 else
432 {
433 return nullptr;
434 }
435 }
436}
437
438// Creates and adds a item that can be manipulated after
439// Returns item in tuple with result if failed to add item, nullptr on success
440std::tuple<AddItemResult, std::unique_ptr<Item>> ItemInterface::SafeAddItem(std::unique_ptr<Item> pItem, int8_t ContainerSlot, int16_t slot)
441{
442 return m_AddItem(std::move(pItem), ContainerSlot, slot);
443}
444
445// Adds items to player inventory, this includes all types of slots.
446// Returns item in tuple with result if failed to add item, nullptr on success
447std::tuple<AddItemResult, std::unique_ptr<Item>> ItemInterface::m_AddItem(std::unique_ptr<Item> itemHolder, int8_t ContainerSlot, int16_t slot)
448{
449 if (slot >= MAX_INVENTORY_SLOT)
450 {
451 sLogger.failure("ItemInterface::m_AddItem slot {} is invalid!", slot);
452 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_ERROR, std::move(itemHolder) };
453 }
454
455 if (ContainerSlot >= MAX_INVENTORY_SLOT)
456 {
457 sLogger.failure("ItemInterface::m_AddItem containerSlot {} is invalid!", ContainerSlot);
458 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_ERROR, std::move(itemHolder) };
459 }
460
461 if (itemHolder == nullptr || !itemHolder->getItemProperties() || slot < 0)
462 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_ERROR, std::move(itemHolder) };
463
464 itemHolder->m_isDirty = true;
465
466 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_INVENTORY_SLOT; ++i)
467 {
468 Item * tempitem = m_pItems[i].get();
469 if (tempitem != nullptr)
470 {
471 if (tempitem == itemHolder.get())
472 {
473 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_DUPLICATED, std::move(itemHolder) };
474 }
475
476 if (tempitem->isContainer())
477 {
478 uint32_t k = tempitem->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots;
479 for (uint16_t j = 0; j < k; ++j)
480 {
481 if (static_cast<Container*>(tempitem)->getItem(j) == itemHolder.get())
482 {
483 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_DUPLICATED, std::move(itemHolder) };
484 }
485 }
486 }
487 }
488 }
489
490 // Save raw ptr from itemHolder for later use
491 auto* item = itemHolder.get();
492
493 //case 1, item is from backpack container
494 if (ContainerSlot == INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET)
495 {
496 if (GetInventoryItem(slot) != nullptr /*|| (slot == EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND && !m_pOwner->HasSkillLine(118))*/)
497 {
498 //sLogger.failure("bugged inventory: {} {}", m_pOwner->GetName(), item->getGuid());
499 SlotResult result = this->FindFreeInventorySlot(itemHolder->getItemProperties());
500
501 // send message to player
502 m_pOwner->getSession()->systemMessage("A duplicated item, `{}` was found in your inventory. We've attempted to add it to a free slot in your inventory, if there is none this will fail. It will be attempted again the next time you log on.",
503 itemHolder->getItemProperties()->Name);
504 if (result.Result == true)
505 {
506 // Found a new slot for that item.
507 slot = result.Slot;
508 ContainerSlot = result.ContainerSlot;
509 }
510 else
511 {
512 // don't leak memory!
513 /*delete item;*/
514
515 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_ERROR, std::move(itemHolder) };
516 }
517 }
518
519 if (!GetInventoryItem(slot)) //slot is free, add item.
520 {
521 itemHolder->setOwner(m_pOwner);
522 itemHolder->setContainerGuid(m_pOwner->getGuid());
523 m_pItems[slot] = std::move(itemHolder);
524
525 if (item->getItemProperties()->Bonding == ITEM_BIND_ON_PICKUP)
526 {
527 if (item->getItemProperties()->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_ACCOUNTBOUND) // don't "Soulbind" account-bound items
528 item->addFlags(ITEM_FLAG_ACCOUNTBOUND);
529 else
530 item->addFlags(ITEM_FLAG_SOULBOUND);
531 }
532
533 if (m_pOwner->IsInWorld() && !item->IsInWorld())
534 {
535 item->PushToWorld(m_pOwner->getWorldMap());
536 ByteBuffer buf(2500);
537 uint32_t count = item->buildCreateUpdateBlockForPlayer(&buf, m_pOwner);
538 m_pOwner->getUpdateMgr().pushCreationData(&buf, count);
539 }
540 setOwnerInventoryItem(static_cast<uint8_t>(slot), item->getGuid());
541 }
542 else
543 {
544 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_ERROR, std::move(itemHolder) };
545 }
546 }
547 else //case 2: item is from a bag container
548 {
549 if (GetInventoryItem(ContainerSlot) && GetInventoryItem(ContainerSlot)->isContainer() &&
550 slot < (int32_t)GetInventoryItem(ContainerSlot)->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots) //container exists
551 {
552 auto [result, returnedItem] = static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[ContainerSlot].get())->addItem(slot, std::move(itemHolder));
553 if (!result)
554 {
555 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_ERROR, std::move(returnedItem) };
556 }
557 }
558 else
559 {
560 itemHolder->deleteFromDB(); //wpe dupefix ..we don't want it reappearing on the next relog now do we?
561 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_ERROR, std::move(itemHolder) };
562 }
563 }
564
565 if (slot < EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END && ContainerSlot == INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET)
566 {
567 m_pOwner->setVisibleItemFields(slot, item);
568 }
569
570 sendEnchantDurations(item);
571
572 if (m_pOwner->IsInWorld() && slot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END && ContainerSlot == INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET)
573 {
574 m_pOwner->applyItemMods(item, slot, true);
575 }
576
577 if (slot >= CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_START && slot < CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_END)
578 {
579 m_pOwner->updateKnownCurrencies(item->getEntry(), true);
580 }
581
582 if (ContainerSlot == INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET && slot == EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND && item->getItemProperties()->Class == ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON)
583 {
584 /////////////////////////////////////////// Titan's grip stuff ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
585
586 uint32_t subclass = item->getItemProperties()->SubClass;
587 if (subclass == ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_TWOHAND_AXE || subclass == ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_TWOHAND_MACE || subclass == ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_TWOHAND_SWORD)
588 {
589 m_pOwner->castSpell(m_pOwner, 49152, true);
590
591 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
592 }
593 }
594
595#if VERSION_STRING > TBC
596 m_pOwner->updateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_OWN_ITEM, item->getEntry(), 1, 0);
597#endif
598 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////// existingduration stuff /////////////////////////////////////////////////////
599 if (item->getItemProperties()->ExistingDuration != 0)
600 {
601 if (item->getItemExpireTime() == 0)
602 {
603 item->setItemExpireTime(UNIXTIME + item->getItemProperties()->ExistingDuration);
604 item->setDuration(item->getItemProperties()->ExistingDuration);
605 sEventMgr.AddEvent(item, &Item::eventRemoveItem, EVENT_REMOVE_ITEM, item->getItemProperties()->ExistingDuration * 1000, 1, EVENT_FLAG_DO_NOT_EXECUTE_IN_WORLD_CONTEXT | EVENT_FLAG_DELETES_OBJECT);
606 }
607 else
608 {
609 item->setDuration(static_cast<uint32_t>(item->getItemExpireTime() - UNIXTIME));
610 sEventMgr.AddEvent(item, &Item::eventRemoveItem, EVENT_REMOVE_ITEM, (item->getItemExpireTime() - UNIXTIME) * 1000, 1, EVENT_FLAG_DO_NOT_EXECUTE_IN_WORLD_CONTEXT | EVENT_FLAG_DELETES_OBJECT);
611 }
612
613 // if we are already in the world we will send the durationupdate now, so we can see the remaining duration in the client
614 // otherwise we will send the updates in Player::Onpushtoworld anyways
615 if (m_pOwner->IsInWorld())
616 sEventMgr.AddEvent(item, &Item::sendDurationUpdate, EVENT_SEND_PACKET_TO_PLAYER_AFTER_LOGIN, 0, 1, EVENT_FLAG_DO_NOT_EXECUTE_IN_WORLD_CONTEXT);
617 }
618
619 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_OK, nullptr };
620}
621
622/// Checks if the slot is a Bag slot
623bool ItemInterface::IsBagSlot(int16_t slot)
624{
625 if ((slot >= INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START && slot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END) || (slot >= BANK_SLOT_BAG_START && slot < BANK_SLOT_BAG_END))
626 {
627 return true;
628 }
629 return false;
630}
631
632/// Removes the item safely and returns it back for usage
633std::unique_ptr<Item> ItemInterface::SafeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot(int8_t ContainerSlot, int16_t slot, bool destroy)
634{
635 if (slot >= MAX_INVENTORY_SLOT)
636 {
637 sLogger.failure("ItemInterface::SafeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot slot {} is invalid!", slot);
638 return nullptr;
639 }
640
641 if (ContainerSlot >= MAX_INVENTORY_SLOT)
642 {
643 sLogger.failure("ItemInterface::SafeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot containerSlot {} is invalid!", ContainerSlot);
644 return nullptr;
645 }
646
647 std::unique_ptr<Item> pItem = nullptr;
648
649 if (ContainerSlot == INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET)
650 {
651 auto* rawItem = GetInventoryItem(ContainerSlot, slot);
652
653 if (rawItem == nullptr)
654 {
655 return nullptr;
656 }
657
658 if (rawItem->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots > 0 && rawItem->isContainer() && static_cast<Container*>(rawItem)->hasItems())
659 {
660 // sounds weird? no. this will trigger a callstack display due to my other debug code.
661 rawItem->deleteFromDB();
662 return nullptr;
663 }
664
665 if (rawItem->getOwner() != m_pOwner)
666 return nullptr;
667
668 pItem = std::move(m_pItems[slot]);
669 if (pItem->getOwner() == m_pOwner)
670 {
671 pItem->m_isDirty = true;
672
673 setOwnerInventoryItem(static_cast<uint8_t>(slot), 0);
674
675 sendEnchantDurations(pItem.get());
676
677 if (slot < EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END)
678 {
679 m_pOwner->applyItemMods(pItem.get(), slot, false);
680 m_pOwner->setVisibleItemFields(slot, nullptr);
681 }
682 else if (slot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END)
683 m_pOwner->applyItemMods(pItem.get(), slot, false);
684
685 sQuestMgr.onPlayerItemRemove(GetOwner(), pItem.get());
686
687 if (destroy)
688 {
689 if (pItem->IsInWorld())
690 {
691 pItem->removeFromWorld();
692 }
693 pItem->deleteFromDB();
694 }
695 }
696 }
697 else
698 {
699 Item* pContainer = GetInventoryItem(ContainerSlot);
700 if (pContainer && pContainer->isContainer())
701 {
702 pItem = static_cast<Container*>(pContainer)->safeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot(slot, destroy);
703 }
704 }
705
706 return pItem;
707}
708
709/// Removes the item safely by guid and returns it back for usage, supports full inventory
710std::unique_ptr<Item> ItemInterface::SafeRemoveAndRetreiveItemByGuid(uint64_t guid, bool destroy)
711{
712 int16_t i = 0;
713
714 for (i = EQUIPMENT_SLOT_START; i < EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END; ++i)
715 {
716 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(i);
717 if (item && item->getGuid() == guid)
718 {
719 return this->SafeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, i, destroy);
720 }
721 }
722
723 for (i = INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
724 {
725 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(i);
726 if (item && item->getGuid() == guid)
727 {
728 return this->SafeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, i, destroy);
729 }
730 }
731
732 for (i = INVENTORY_KEYRING_START; i < INVENTORY_KEYRING_END; ++i)
733 {
734 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(i);
735 if (item && item->getGuid() == guid)
736 {
737 return this->SafeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, i, destroy);
738 }
739 }
740
741 for (i = CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_START; i < CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_END; ++i)
742 {
743 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(i);
744 if (item && item->getGuid() == guid)
745 {
746 return this->SafeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, i, destroy);
747 }
748 }
749
750 for (i = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
751 {
752 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(i);
753 if (item && item->getGuid() == guid)
754 {
755 return this->SafeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, i, destroy);
756 }
757 else
758 {
759 if (item && item->isContainer())
760 {
761 for (uint32_t j = 0; j < item->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++j)
762 {
763 Item* item2 = static_cast<Container*>(item)->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(j));
764 if (item2 && item2->getGuid() == guid)
765 {
766 return static_cast<Container*>(item)->safeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot(static_cast<int16_t>(j), destroy);
767 }
768 }
769 }
770 }
771 }
772
773 for (i = BANK_SLOT_ITEM_START; i < BANK_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
774 {
775 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(i);
776 if (item && item->getGuid() == guid)
777 {
778 return this->SafeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, i, destroy);
779 }
780 }
781
782 for (i = BANK_SLOT_BAG_START; i < BANK_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
783 {
784 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(i);
785 if (item && item->getGuid() == guid)
786 {
787 return this->SafeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, i, destroy);
788 }
789 else
790 {
791 if (item && item->isContainer())
792 {
793 for (uint32_t j = 0; j < item->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++j)
794 {
795 Item* item2 = static_cast<Container*>(item)->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(j));
796 if (item2 && item2->getGuid() == guid)
797 {
798 return static_cast<Container*>(item)->safeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot(static_cast<int16_t>(j), destroy);
799 }
800 }
801 }
802 }
803 }
804
805 return nullptr;
806}
807
808/// Completely removes item from player
809/// \return true if item removal was succefull
810bool ItemInterface::SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(int8_t ContainerSlot, int16_t slot)
811{
812 if (slot >= MAX_INVENTORY_SLOT)
813 {
814 sLogger.failure("ItemInterface::SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot slot {} is invalid!", slot);
815 return false;
816 }
817
818 if (ContainerSlot >= MAX_INVENTORY_SLOT)
819 {
820 sLogger.failure("ItemInterface::SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot containerSlot {} is invalid!", ContainerSlot);
821 return false;
822 }
823
824 if (ContainerSlot == INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET)
825 {
826 Item* rawItem = GetInventoryItem(slot);
827
828 if (rawItem == nullptr)
829 return false;
830
831 if (rawItem->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots > 0 && rawItem->isContainer() && static_cast<Container*>(rawItem)->hasItems())
832 {
833 // sounds weird? no. this will trigger a callstack display due to my other debug code.
834 rawItem->deleteFromDB();
835 return false;
836 }
837
838 if (rawItem->getOwner() != m_pOwner)
839 return false;
840
841 std::unique_ptr<Item> pItem = std::move(m_pItems[slot]);
842 // hacky crashfix
843 if (pItem->getOwner() == m_pOwner)
844 {
845 pItem->m_isDirty = true;
846
847 setOwnerInventoryItem(static_cast<uint8_t>(slot), 0);
848
849 sendEnchantDurations(pItem.get());
850
851 if (slot < EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END)
852 {
853 m_pOwner->applyItemMods(pItem.get(), slot, false);
854 m_pOwner->setVisibleItemFields(slot, nullptr);
855 }
856 else if (slot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END)
857 m_pOwner->applyItemMods(pItem.get(), slot, false); //watch containers that give attackspeed and stuff ;)
858
859 if (pItem->IsInWorld())
860 {
861 pItem->removeFromWorld();
862 }
863
864 pItem->deleteFromDB();
865
866 sQuestMgr.onPlayerItemRemove(GetOwner(), pItem.get());
867
868 //delete pItem;
869 // We make it a garbage item, so when it's used for a spell, it gets deleted in the next Player update
870 // otherwise we get a nice crash
871 m_pOwner->addGarbageItem(std::move(pItem));
872 }
873 }
874 else
875 {
876 Item* pContainer = GetInventoryItem(ContainerSlot);
877 if (pContainer && pContainer->isContainer())
878 {
879 return static_cast<Container*>(pContainer)->safeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(slot);
880 }
881 }
882 return true;
883}
884

984/// Gets a item from Inventory
985Item* ItemInterface::GetInventoryItem(int16_t slot)
986{
987 if (slot < 0 || slot >= MAX_INVENTORY_SLOT)
988 return nullptr;
989
990 return m_pItems[slot].get();
991}
992
993/// Gets a Item from inventory or container
994Item* ItemInterface::GetInventoryItem(int8_t ContainerSlot, int16_t slot)
995{
996 if (ContainerSlot <= INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET)
997 {
998 if (slot < 0 || slot >= MAX_INVENTORY_SLOT)
999 return nullptr;
1000
1001 return m_pItems[slot].get();
1002 }
1003 else
1004 {
1005 if (IsBagSlot(ContainerSlot))
1006 {
1007 if (m_pItems[(int)ContainerSlot])
1008 {
1009 return static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[ContainerSlot].get())->getItem(slot);
1010 }
1011 }
1012 }
1013 return nullptr;
1014}
1015
1016Container* ItemInterface::GetContainer(int8_t containerSlot)
1017{
1018 if (!IsBagSlot(containerSlot))
1019 return nullptr;
1020
1021 if (m_pItems[containerSlot] == nullptr)
1022 return nullptr;
1023
1024 return static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[containerSlot].get());
1025}

1027/// Checks for stacks that didn't reached max capacity
1028Item* ItemInterface::FindItemLessMax(uint32_t itemid, uint32_t cnt, bool IncBank)
1029{
1030 uint32_t i;
1031 for (i = INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
1032 {
1033 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1034 if (item)
1035 {
1036 uint32_t itemMaxStack = (item->getOwner()->m_cheats.hasItemStackCheat) ? 0x7fffffff : item->getItemProperties()->MaxCount;
1037 if ((item->getEntry() == itemid && item->m_wrappedItemId == 0) && (itemMaxStack >= (item->getStackCount() + cnt)))
1038 {
1039 return item;
1040 }
1041 }
1042 }
1043
1044 for (i = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
1045 {
1046 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1047 if (item && item->isContainer())
1048 {
1049 for (uint32_t j = 0; j < item->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++j)
1050 {
1051 Item* item2 = static_cast<Container*>(item)->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(j));
1052 if (item2)
1053 {
1054 uint32_t itemMaxStack = (item2->getOwner()->m_cheats.hasItemStackCheat) ? 0x7fffffff : item2->getItemProperties()->MaxCount;
1055 if ((item2->getItemProperties()->ItemId == itemid && item2->m_wrappedItemId == 0) && (itemMaxStack >= (item2->getStackCount() + cnt)))
1056 {
1057 return item2;
1058 }
1059 }
1060 }
1061
1062 }
1063 }
1064
1065 for (i = CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_START; i < CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_END; ++i)
1066 {
1067 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1068 if (item)
1069 {
1070 uint32_t itemMaxStack = (item->getOwner()->m_cheats.hasItemStackCheat) ? 0x7fffffff : item->getItemProperties()->MaxCount;
1071 if ((item->getEntry() == itemid && item->m_wrappedItemId == 0) && (itemMaxStack >= (item->getStackCount() + cnt)))
1072 {
1073 return item;
1074 }
1075 }
1076 }
1077
1078 if (IncBank)
1079 {
1080 for (i = BANK_SLOT_ITEM_START; i < BANK_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
1081 {
1082 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1083 if (item)
1084 {
1085 uint32_t itemMaxStack = (item->getOwner()->m_cheats.hasItemStackCheat) ? 0x7fffffff : item->getItemProperties()->MaxCount;
1086 if ((item->getEntry() == itemid && item->m_wrappedItemId == 0) && (itemMaxStack >= (item->getStackCount() + cnt)))
1087 {
1088 return item;
1089 }
1090 }
1091 }
1092
1093 for (i = BANK_SLOT_BAG_START; i < BANK_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
1094 {
1095 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1096 if (item && item->isContainer())
1097 {
1098
1099 for (uint32_t j = 0; j < item->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++j)
1100 {
1101 Item* item2 = static_cast<Container*>(item)->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(j));
1102 if (item2)
1103 {
1104 uint32_t itemMaxStack = (item2->getOwner()->m_cheats.hasItemStackCheat) ? 0x7fffffff : item2->getItemProperties()->MaxCount;
1105 if ((item2->getItemProperties()->ItemId == itemid && item2->m_wrappedItemId == 0) && (itemMaxStack >= (item2->getStackCount() + cnt)))
1106 {
1107 return item2;
1108 }
1109 }
1110 }
1111
1112 }
1113 }
1114 }
1115
1116 return nullptr;
1117}

1119/// Finds item ammount on inventory, banks not included
1120uint32_t ItemInterface::GetItemCount(uint32_t itemid, bool IncBank)
1121{
1122 uint32_t cnt = 0;

1124 for (i = EQUIPMENT_SLOT_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
1125 {
1126 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1127
1128 if (item)
1129 {
1130 if (item->getEntry() == itemid && item->m_wrappedItemId == 0)
1131 {
1132 cnt += item->getStackCount() ? item->getStackCount() : 1;
1133 }
1134 }
1135 }
1136
1137 for (i = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
1138 {

1145 if (item2)
1146 {
1147 if (item2->getEntry() == itemid && item->m_wrappedItemId == 0)
1148 {
1149 cnt += item2->getStackCount() ? item2->getStackCount() : 1;
1150 }
1151 }
1152 }
1153
1154 }
1155 }
1156

1158 {
1159 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1160
1161 if (item)
1162 {
1163 if (item->getItemProperties()->ItemId == itemid && item->m_wrappedItemId == 0)
1164 {
1165 cnt += item->getStackCount() ? item->getStackCount() : 1;
1166 }
1167 }
1168 }
1169
1170 for (i = CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_START; i < CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_END; ++i)
1171 {
1172 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1173
1174 if (item)
1175 {
1176 if (item->getItemProperties()->ItemId == itemid && item->m_wrappedItemId == 0)
1177 {
1178 cnt += item->getStackCount() ? item->getStackCount() : 1;
1179 }
1180 }
1181 }
1182
1183 if (IncBank)
1184 {
1185 for (i = BANK_SLOT_ITEM_START; i < BANK_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
1186 {

1188 if (item)
1189 {
1190 if (item->getItemProperties()->ItemId == itemid && item->m_wrappedItemId == 0)

1192 cnt += item->getStackCount() ? item->getStackCount() : 1;
1193 }
1194 }
1195 }
1196

1198 {
1199 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1200 if (item)
1201 {
1202 if (item->isContainer())
1203 {
1204 for (uint32_t j = 0; j < item->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++j)

1207 if (item2)
1208 {

1212 }
1213 }
1214 }
1215 }
1216 }
1217 }
1218 }
1219 return cnt;

1221
1222/// Removes a ammount of items from inventory
1223uint32_t ItemInterface::RemoveItemAmt(uint32_t id, uint32_t amt)
1224{
1225 uint32_t i;
1226
1227 for (i = EQUIPMENT_SLOT_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
1228 {
1229 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1230 if (item)
1231 {
1232 if (item->getEntry() == id && item->m_wrappedItemId == 0)
1233 {
1234 if (item->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots > 0 && item->isContainer() && ((Container*)item)->hasItems())
1235 {
1236 // sounds weird? no. this will trigger a callstack display due to my other debug code.
1237 item->deleteFromDB();
1238 continue;
1239 }
1240
1241 if (item->getStackCount() > amt)
1242 {
1243 item->setStackCount(item->getStackCount() - amt);
1244 item->m_isDirty = true;
1245 sQuestMgr.onPlayerItemRemove(GetOwner(), item);
1246 return amt;
1247 }
1248 else if (item->getStackCount() == amt)
1249 {
1250 bool result = SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1251 if (result)
1252 {
1253 return amt;
1254 }
1255 else
1256 {
1257 return 0;
1258 }
1259 }
1260 else
1261 {
1262 amt -= item->getStackCount();
1263 SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1264 }
1265 }
1266 }
1267 }
1268
1269 for (i = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
1270 {
1271 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1272 if (item && item->isContainer())
1273 {
1274 for (uint32_t j = 0; j < item->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++j)
1275 {
1276 Item* item2 = ((Container*)item)->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(j));
1277 if (item2)
1278 {
1279 if (item2->getItemProperties()->ItemId == id && item->m_wrappedItemId == 0)
1280 {
1281 if (item2->getStackCount() > amt)
1282 {
1283 item2->setStackCount(item2->getStackCount() - amt);
1284 item2->m_isDirty = true;
1285 sQuestMgr.onPlayerItemRemove(GetOwner(), item2);
1286 return amt;
1287 }
1288 else if (item2->getStackCount() == amt)
1289 {
1290 bool result = SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(static_cast<int8_t>(i), static_cast<int16_t>(j));
1291 if (result)
1292 {
1293 return amt;
1294 }
1295 else
1296 {
1297 return 0;
1298 }
1299 }
1300 else
1301 {
1302 amt -= item2->getStackCount();
1303 SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(static_cast<int8_t>(i), static_cast<int16_t>(j));
1304
1305 }
1306 }
1307 }
1308 }
1309 }
1310 }
1311
1312 for (i = INVENTORY_KEYRING_START; i < INVENTORY_KEYRING_END; ++i)
1313 {
1314 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1315 if (item)
1316 {
1317 if (item->getItemProperties()->ItemId == id && item->m_wrappedItemId == 0)
1318 {
1319 if (item->getStackCount() > amt)
1320 {
1321 item->setStackCount(item->getStackCount() - amt);
1322 item->m_isDirty = true;
1323 sQuestMgr.onPlayerItemRemove(GetOwner(), item);
1324 return amt;
1325 }
1326 else if (item->getStackCount() == amt)
1327 {
1328 bool result = SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1329 if (result)
1330 {
1331 return amt;
1332 }
1333 else
1334 {
1335 return 0;
1336 }
1337 }
1338 else
1339 {
1340 amt -= item->getStackCount();
1341 SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1342 }
1343 }
1344 }
1345 }
1346
1347 for (i = CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_START; i < CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_END; ++i)
1348 {
1349 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1350 if (item)
1351 {
1352 if (item->getItemProperties()->ItemId == id && item->m_wrappedItemId == 0)
1353 {
1354 if (item->getStackCount() > amt)
1355 {
1356 item->setStackCount(item->getStackCount() - amt);
1357 item->m_isDirty = true;
1358 sQuestMgr.onPlayerItemRemove(GetOwner(), item);
1359 return amt;
1360 }
1361 else if (item->getStackCount() == amt)
1362 {
1363 bool result = SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1364 if (result)
1365 {
1366 return amt;
1367 }
1368 else
1369 {
1370 return 0;
1371 }
1372 }
1373 else
1374 {
1375 amt -= item->getStackCount();
1376 SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1377 }
1378 }
1379 }
1380 }
1381 return 0;
1382}

1737
1738void ItemInterface::RemoveAllConjured()
1739{
1740 for (uint32_t x = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; x < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++x)
1741 {
1742 if (m_pItems[x] != nullptr)
1743 {
1744 if (IsBagSlot(static_cast<int16_t>(x)) && m_pItems[x]->isContainer())
1745 {
1746 Container* bag = static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[x].get());
1747
1748 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < bag->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++i)
1749 {
1750 if (bag->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i)) != nullptr && bag->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i))->getItemProperties()->Flags & 2)
1751 bag->safeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1752 }
1753 }
1754 else
1755 {
1756 if (m_pItems[x]->getItemProperties()->Flags & 2)
1757 SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, static_cast<int16_t>(x));
1758 }
1759 }
1760 }
1761}

1763/// Gets slot number by itemid, banks not included
1764int16_t ItemInterface::GetInventorySlotById(uint32_t ID)
1765{
1766 for (uint16_t i = 0; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
1767 {
1768 if (m_pItems[i])
1769 {
1770 if (m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->ItemId == ID)
1771 {
1772 return i;
1773 }
1774 }
1775 }
1776
1777 for (uint16_t i = INVENTORY_KEYRING_START; i < INVENTORY_KEYRING_END; ++i)
1778 {
1779 if (m_pItems[i])
1780 {
1781 if (m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->ItemId == ID)
1782 {
1783 return i;
1784 }
1785 }
1786 }
1787
1788 for (uint16_t i = CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_START; i < CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_END; ++i)
1789 {
1790 if (m_pItems[i])
1791 {
1792 if (m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->ItemId == ID)
1793 {
1794 return i;
1795 }
1796 }
1797 }
1798 return ITEM_NO_SLOT_AVAILABLE;

1840int16_t ItemInterface::GetBagSlotByGuid(uint64_t guid)
1841{
1842 for (uint16_t i = EQUIPMENT_SLOT_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
1843 {
1844 if (m_pItems[i])
1845 {
1846 if (m_pItems[i]->getGuid() == guid)
1847 {
1848 return i;
1849 }
1850 }
1851 }
1852
1853 for (uint16_t i = INVENTORY_KEYRING_START; i < CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_END; ++i)
1854 {
1855 if (m_pItems[i])
1856 {
1857 if (m_pItems[i]->getGuid() == guid)
1858 {
1859 return i;
1860 }
1861 }
1862 }
1863
1864 for (uint16_t i = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
1865 {
1866 if (m_pItems[i] && m_pItems[i]->isContainer())
1867 {
1868 for (uint32_t j = 0; j < m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++j)
1869 {
1870 Item* inneritem = (static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[i].get()))->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(j));
1871 if (inneritem && inneritem->getGuid() == guid)
1872 return i;
1873 }
1874 }
1875 }
1876
1877 return ITEM_NO_SLOT_AVAILABLE; //was changed from 0 cuz 0 is the slot for head

1879
1880/// Adds a Item to a free slot
1881std::tuple<AddItemResult, std::unique_ptr<Item>> ItemInterface::AddItemToFreeSlot(std::unique_ptr<Item> item)
1882{
1883 if (item == nullptr)
1884 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_ERROR, nullptr };
1885
1886 if (item->getItemProperties() == nullptr)
1887 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_ERROR, nullptr };
1888
1889 uint8_t i;
1890 Player* p = m_pOwner;
1891 uint32_t itemMaxStack = item->getItemProperties()->MaxCount;
1892
1893 //detect special bag item
1894 if (item->getItemProperties()->BagFamily)
1895 {
1896 if (item->getItemProperties()->BagFamily & ITEM_TYPE_KEYRING || item->getItemProperties()->Class == ITEM_CLASS_KEY)
1897 {
1898 for (i = INVENTORY_KEYRING_START; i < INVENTORY_KEYRING_END; ++i)
1899 {
1900 if (m_pItems[i] == nullptr)
1901 {
1902 auto [result3, returnedItem] = SafeAddItem(std::move(item), INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1903 if (result3)
1904 {
1905 m_result.ContainerSlot = INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET;
1906 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
1907 m_result.Result = true;
1908 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_OK, nullptr };
1909 }
1910 else
1911 {
1912 item = std::move(returnedItem);
1913 }
1914 }
1915 }
1916 }
1917 else if (item->getItemProperties()->BagFamily & ITEM_TYPE_CURRENCY)
1918 {
1919 for (i = CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_START; i < CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_END; ++i)
1920 {
1921 if (m_pItems[i])
1922 itemMaxStack = (p->m_cheats.hasItemStackCheat) ? 0x7fffffff : m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->MaxCount;
1923
1924 if (m_pItems[i] == nullptr)
1925 {
1926 auto [result3, returnedItem] = SafeAddItem(std::move(item), INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1927 if (result3)
1928 {
1929 m_result.ContainerSlot = INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET;
1930 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
1931 m_result.Result = true;
1932 p->updateKnownCurrencies(m_pItems[i]->getEntry(), true);
1933 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_OK, nullptr };
1934 }
1935 else
1936 {
1937 item = std::move(returnedItem);
1938 }
1939 }
1940 else if (m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->ItemId == item->getItemProperties()->ItemId && itemMaxStack > 1 &&
1941 m_pItems[i]->getStackCount() < itemMaxStack &&
1942 m_pItems[i]->getStackCount() + item->getStackCount() <= itemMaxStack)
1943 {
1944 m_pItems[i]->setStackCount(m_pItems[i]->getStackCount() + item->getStackCount());
1945 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
1946 m_result.Result = true;
1947 p->updateKnownCurrencies(m_pItems[i]->getEntry(), true);
1948 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_OK, nullptr };
1949 }
1950 }
1951 }
1952 else
1953 {
1954 for (i = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
1955 {
1956 if (m_pItems[i])
1957 {
1958 if (m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->BagFamily & item->getItemProperties()->BagFamily)
1959 {
1960 if (m_pItems[i]->isContainer())
1961 {
1962 uint32_t r_slot;
1963 auto [result2, returnedItem] = static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[i].get())->addItemToFreeSlot(std::move(item), &r_slot);
1964 if (result2)
1965 {
1966 m_result.ContainerSlot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
1967 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(r_slot);
1968 m_result.Result = true;
1969 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_OK, nullptr };
1970 }
1971 else
1972 {
1973 item = std::move(returnedItem);
1974 }
1975 }
1976 }
1977 }
1978 }
1979 }
1980 }
1981
1982 //INVENTORY
1983 for (i = INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
1984 {
1985 if (m_pItems[i])
1986 itemMaxStack = (p->m_cheats.hasItemStackCheat) ? 0x7fffffff : m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->MaxCount;
1987 if (m_pItems[i] == nullptr)
1988 {
1989 auto [result3, returnedItem] = SafeAddItem(std::move(item), INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, static_cast<int16_t>(i));
1990 if (result3)
1991 {
1992 m_result.ContainerSlot = INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET;
1993 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
1994 m_result.Result = true;
1995 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_OK, nullptr };
1996 }
1997 else
1998 {
1999 item = std::move(returnedItem);
2000 }
2001 }
2002 else if (m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->ItemId == item->getItemProperties()->ItemId &&
2003 itemMaxStack > 1 &&
2004 m_pItems[i]->getStackCount() < itemMaxStack &&
2005 m_pItems[i]->getStackCount() + item->getStackCount() <= itemMaxStack)
2006 {
2007 m_pItems[i]->setStackCount(m_pItems[i]->getStackCount() + item->getStackCount());
2008 m_pItems[i]->m_isDirty = true;
2009 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
2010 m_result.Result = true;
2011
2012 // delete the item because we added the stacks to another one
2013 item->deleteFromDB();
2014 // We make it a garbage item, so if it's used after calling this method, it gets deleted in the next Player update
2015 // otherwise we get a nice crash
2016 m_pOwner->addGarbageItem(std::move(item));
2017
2018 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_OK, nullptr };
2019 }
2020 }
2021
2022 //INVENTORY BAGS
2023 for (i = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
2024 {
2025 if (m_pItems[i] != nullptr && m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->BagFamily == 0 && m_pItems[i]->isContainer()) //special bags ignored
2026 {
2027 for (uint32_t j = 0; j < m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++j)
2028 {
2029 Item* item2 = (static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[i].get()))->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(j));
2030 if (item2)
2031 itemMaxStack = (p->m_cheats.hasItemStackCheat) ? 0x7fffffff : item2->getItemProperties()->MaxCount;
2032 if (item2 == nullptr)
2033 {
2034 auto [result3, returnedItem] = SafeAddItem(std::move(item), static_cast<int8_t>(i), static_cast<int16_t>(j));
2035 if (result3)
2036 {
2037 m_result.ContainerSlot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
2038 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(j);
2039 m_result.Result = true;
2040 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_OK, nullptr };
2041 }
2042 else
2043 {
2044 item = std::move(returnedItem);
2045 }
2046 }
2047 else if (item2->getItemProperties()->ItemId == item->getItemProperties()->ItemId &&
2048 itemMaxStack > 1 &&
2049 item2->getStackCount() < itemMaxStack &&
2050 item2->getStackCount() + item->getStackCount() <= itemMaxStack)
2051 {
2052 item2->setStackCount(item2->getStackCount() + item->getStackCount());
2053 item2->m_isDirty = true;
2054 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
2055 m_result.Result = true;
2056
2057 // delete the item because we added the stacks to another one
2058 item->deleteFromDB();
2059 // We make it a garbage item, so if it's used after calling this method, it gets deleted in the next Player update
2060 // otherwise we get a nice crash
2061 m_pOwner->addGarbageItem(std::move(item));
2062
2063 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_OK, nullptr };
2064 }
2065 }
2066 }
2067 }
2068 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_ERROR, std::move(item) };
2069}
2070
2071/// Calculates inventory free slots, bag inventory slots not included
2072uint32_t ItemInterface::CalculateFreeSlots(ItemProperties const* proto)
2073{
2074 uint32_t count = 0;
2075 uint32_t i;
2076
2077 if (proto)
2078 {
2079 if (proto->BagFamily)
2080 {
2081 if (proto->BagFamily & ITEM_TYPE_KEYRING || proto->Class == ITEM_CLASS_KEY)
2082 {
2083 for (i = INVENTORY_KEYRING_START; i < INVENTORY_KEYRING_END; ++i)
2084 {
2085 if (m_pItems[i] == nullptr)
2086 {
2087 count++;
2088 }
2089 }
2090 }
2091 else if (proto->BagFamily & ITEM_TYPE_CURRENCY)
2092 {
2093 for (i = CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_START; i < CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_END; ++i)
2094 {
2095 if (m_pItems[i] == nullptr)
2096 {
2097 count++;
2098 }
2099 }
2100 }
2101 else
2102 {
2103 for (i = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
2104 {
2105 if (m_pItems[i] && m_pItems[i]->isContainer())
2106 {
2107 if (m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->BagFamily & proto->BagFamily)
2108 {
2109 int8_t slot = static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[i].get())->findFreeSlot();
2110 if (slot != ITEM_NO_SLOT_AVAILABLE)
2111 {
2112 count++;
2113 }
2114 }
2115 }
2116 }
2117 }
2118 }
2119 }
2120
2121 for (i = INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
2122 {
2123 if (m_pItems[i] == nullptr)
2124 {
2125 count++;
2126 }
2127 }
2128
2129 for (i = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
2130 {
2131 if (m_pItems[i] != nullptr)
2132 {
2133 if (m_pItems[i]->isContainer() && !m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->BagFamily)
2134 {
2135
2136 for (uint32_t j = 0; j < m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++j)
2137 {
2138 Item* item2 = (static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[i].get()))->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(j));
2139 if (item2 == nullptr)
2140 {
2141 count++;
2142 }
2143 }
2144 }
2145 }
2146 }
2147 return count;
2148}

2150/// Finds a free slot on the backpack
2151int8_t ItemInterface::FindFreeBackPackSlot()
2152{
2153 //search for backpack slots
2154 for (int8_t i = INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
2155 {
2156 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(i);
2157 if (!item)
2158 {
2159 return i;
2160 }
2161 }
2162
2163 return ITEM_NO_SLOT_AVAILABLE; //no slots available
2164}

2166uint8_t ItemInterface::FindFreeBackPackSlotMax()
2167{
2168 //search for backpack slots
2169 uint8_t slotfree = 0;
2170 for (int8_t i = INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
2171 {
2172 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(i);
2173 if (!item) slotfree++;
2174 }
2175 return slotfree;

2193 return 3;

2196 {

2200 {

2202 }

2204 {

2216/// Checks if the item can be equipped on a specific slot this will check unique-equipped gems as well
2217int8_t ItemInterface::CanEquipItemInSlot2(int8_t DstInvSlot, int8_t slot, Item* item, bool ignore_combat /* = false */, bool skip_2h_check /* = false */)
2218{
2219 ItemProperties const* proto = item->getItemProperties();
2220
2221 if (int8_t ret = CanEquipItemInSlot(DstInvSlot, slot, proto, ignore_combat, skip_2h_check))
2222 return ret;
2223
2224#if VERSION_STRING > Classic
2225 if ((slot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END && DstInvSlot == INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET) || (slot >= BANK_SLOT_BAG_START && slot < BANK_SLOT_BAG_END && DstInvSlot == INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET))
2226 {
2227 for (uint8_t count = 0; count < item->getSocketSlotCount(); count++)
2228 {
2229 const auto ei = item->getEnchantment(static_cast<EnchantmentSlot>(SOCK_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT1 + count));
2230
2231 if (ei && ei->Enchantment->GemEntry) //huh ? Gem without entry ?
2232 {
2233 ItemProperties const* ip = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(ei->Enchantment->GemEntry);
2234
2235 if (ip) //maybe gem got removed from db due to update ?
2236 {
2237 if (ip->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_UNIQUE_EQUIP && IsEquipped(ip->ItemId))
2238 {
2239 return INV_ERR_CANT_CARRY_MORE_OF_THIS;
2240 }
2241
2242#if VERSION_STRING > TBC
2243 if (ip->ItemLimitCategory > 0)
2244 {
2245 uint32_t LimitId = ip->ItemLimitCategory;
2246 auto item_limit_category = sItemLimitCategoryStore.lookupEntry(LimitId);
2247 if (item_limit_category)
2248 {
2249 uint32_t gemCount = 0;
2250 if ((item_limit_category->equippedFlag & ILFLAG_EQUIP_ONLY && slot < EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END) || (!(item_limit_category->equippedFlag & ILFLAG_EQUIP_ONLY) && slot > EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END))
2251 gemCount = item->countGemsWithLimitId(item_limit_category->Id);
2252
2253 uint32_t gCount = GetEquippedCountByItemLimit(item_limit_category->Id);
2254 if ((gCount + gemCount) > item_limit_category->maxAmount)
2255 return INV_ERR_CANT_CARRY_MORE_OF_THIS;
2256 }
2257 }
2258#endif
2259 }
2260 }
2261 }
2262 }
2263#endif
2264
2265 return 0;
2266}
2267
2268/// Checks if the item can be equipped on a specific slot
2269int8_t ItemInterface::CanEquipItemInSlot(int8_t DstInvSlot, int8_t slot, ItemProperties const* proto, bool ignore_combat /* = false */, bool skip_2h_check /* = false */)
2270{
2271 if (proto == nullptr)
2272 return INV_ERR_ITEMS_CANT_BE_SWAPPED;
2273
2274 uint32_t type = proto->InventoryType;
2275
2276 if (slot >= INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START && slot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END && DstInvSlot == -1)
2277 if (proto->ContainerSlots == 0)
2278 return INV_ERR_ITEMS_CANT_BE_SWAPPED;
2279
2280 if ((slot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END && DstInvSlot == INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET) || (slot >= BANK_SLOT_BAG_START && slot < BANK_SLOT_BAG_END && DstInvSlot == INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET))
2281 {
2282 if (!ignore_combat && m_pOwner->getCombatHandler().isInCombat() && (slot < EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND || slot > EQUIPMENT_SLOT_RANGED))
2283 return INV_ERR_CANT_DO_IN_COMBAT;
2284
2285 if (IsEquipped(proto->ItemId) && (proto->Unique || proto->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_UNIQUE_EQUIP))
2286 return INV_ERR_CANT_CARRY_MORE_OF_THIS;
2287
2288 // Check to see if we have the correct race
2289 if (!(proto->AllowableRace & m_pOwner->getRaceMask()))
2290 return INV_ERR_YOU_CAN_NEVER_USE_THAT_ITEM;
2291
2292 // Check to see if we have the correct class
2293 if (!(proto->AllowableClass & m_pOwner->getClassMask()))
2294 return INV_ERR_YOU_CAN_NEVER_USE_THAT_ITEM2;
2295
2296 // Check to see if we have the reqs for that reputation
2297 if (proto->RequiredFaction)
2298 {
2299 Standing current_standing = Player::getReputationRankFromStanding(m_pOwner->getFactionStanding(proto->RequiredFaction));
2300 if (current_standing < (Standing)proto->RequiredFactionStanding) // Not enough rep rankage..
2301 return INV_ERR_ITEM_REPUTATION_NOT_ENOUGH;
2302 }
2303
2304 // Check to see if we have the correct level.
2305 if (proto->RequiredLevel > m_pOwner->getLevel())
2306 return INV_ERR_YOU_MUST_REACH_LEVEL_N;
2307
2308 if (proto->Class == 4)
2309 {
2310 uint32_t bogus_subclass = 0;
2311 uint32_t playerlevel = 0;
2312 // scaling heirloom items
2313 if (proto->ScalingStatsEntry != 0 && proto->ScalingStatsFlag != 0)
2314 {
2315 playerlevel = m_pOwner->getLevel();
2316
2317 if (playerlevel < 40 && proto->SubClass >= 3)
2318 bogus_subclass = proto->SubClass - 1; // mail items become leather, plate items become mail below lvl40
2319 else bogus_subclass = proto->SubClass;
2320 }
2321 else
2322 bogus_subclass = proto->SubClass;
2323
2324 if (!(m_pOwner->getArmorProficiency() & (((uint32_t)(1)) << bogus_subclass)))
2325 return INV_ERR_NO_REQUIRED_PROFICIENCY;
2326
2327 }
2328 else if (proto->Class == 2)
2329 {
2330 if (!(m_pOwner->getWeaponProficiency() & (((uint32_t)(1)) << proto->SubClass)))
2331 return INV_ERR_NO_REQUIRED_PROFICIENCY;
2332 }
2333
2334 if (proto->RequiredSkill)
2335 if (proto->RequiredSkillRank > m_pOwner->getSkillLineCurrent(proto->RequiredSkill, true))
2336 return INV_ERR_SKILL_ISNT_HIGH_ENOUGH;
2337
2338 if (proto->RequiredSpell)
2339 if (!m_pOwner->hasSpell(proto->RequiredSpell))
2340 return INV_ERR_NO_REQUIRED_PROFICIENCY;
2341
2342 // You are dead !
2343 if (m_pOwner->getDeathState() != ALIVE)
2344 return INV_ERR_YOU_ARE_DEAD;
2345 }
2346
2347 switch (uint8_t(slot)) //CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_ are over 128
2348 {
2349 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_HEAD:
2350 {
2351 if (type == INVTYPE_HEAD)
2352 return 0;
2353 else
2354 return INV_ERR_ITEM_DOESNT_GO_TO_SLOT;
2355 }
2356 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_NECK:
2357 {
2358 if (type == INVTYPE_NECK)
2359 return 0;
2360 else
2361 return INV_ERR_ITEM_DOESNT_GO_TO_SLOT;
2362 }
2363 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_SHOULDERS:
2364 {
2365 if (type == INVTYPE_SHOULDERS)
2366 return 0;
2367 else
2368 return INV_ERR_ITEM_DOESNT_GO_TO_SLOT;
2369 }
2370 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_BODY:
2371 {
2372 if (type == INVTYPE_BODY)
2373 return 0;
2374 else
2375 return INV_ERR_ITEM_DOESNT_GO_TO_SLOT;
2376 }
2377 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_CHEST:
2378 {
2379 if (type == INVTYPE_CHEST || type == INVTYPE_ROBE)
2380 return 0;
2381 else
2382 return INV_ERR_ITEM_DOESNT_GO_TO_SLOT;
2383 }
2384 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_WAIST:
2385 {
2386 if (type == INVTYPE_WAIST)
2387 return 0;
2388 else
2389 return INV_ERR_ITEM_DOESNT_GO_TO_SLOT;
2390 }
2391 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_LEGS:
2392 {
2393 if (type == INVTYPE_LEGS)
2394 return 0;
2395 else
2396 return INV_ERR_ITEM_DOESNT_GO_TO_SLOT;
2397 }
2398 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_FEET:
2399 {
2400 if (type == INVTYPE_FEET)
2401 return 0;
2402 else
2403 return INV_ERR_ITEM_DOESNT_GO_TO_SLOT;
2404 }
2405 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_WRISTS:
2406 {
2407 if (type == INVTYPE_WRISTS)
2408 return 0;
2409 else
2410 return INV_ERR_ITEM_DOESNT_GO_TO_SLOT;
2411 }
2412 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_HANDS:
2413 {
2414 if (type == INVTYPE_HANDS)
2415 return 0;
2416 else
2417 return INV_ERR_ITEM_DOESNT_GO_TO_SLOT;
2418 }
2419 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_FINGER1:
2420 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_FINGER2:
2421 {
2422 if (type == INVTYPE_FINGER)
2423 return 0;
2424 else
2425 return INV_ERR_ITEM_DOESNT_GO_TO_SLOT;
2426 }
2427 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_TRINKET1:
2428 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_TRINKET2:
2429 {
2430 if (type == INVTYPE_TRINKET)
2431 return 0;
2432 else
2433 return INV_ERR_ITEM_DOESNT_GO_TO_SLOT;
2434 }
2435 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_BACK:
2436 {
2437 if (type == INVTYPE_CLOAK)
2438 return 0;
2439 else
2440 return INV_ERR_ITEM_DOESNT_GO_TO_SLOT;
2441 }
2442 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND:
2443 {
2444 if (type == INVTYPE_WEAPON || type == INVTYPE_WEAPONMAINHAND ||
2445 (type == INVTYPE_2HWEAPON && (!GetInventoryItem(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND) || skip_2h_check || m_pOwner->canDualWield2H())))
2446 return 0;
2447 else
2448 return INV_ERR_ITEM_DOESNT_GO_TO_SLOT;
2449 }
2450 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND:
2451 {
2452 if ((type == INVTYPE_2HWEAPON || type == INVTYPE_SHIELD) && m_pOwner->canDualWield2H())
2453 {
2454 return 0;

2456
2457 if (type == INVTYPE_WEAPON || type == INVTYPE_WEAPONOFFHAND)
2458 {
2459 Item* mainweapon = GetInventoryItem(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND);
2460 if (mainweapon) //item exists
2461 {
2462 if (mainweapon->getItemProperties()->InventoryType != INVTYPE_2HWEAPON)
2463 {
2464 if (m_pOwner->hasSkillLine(SKILL_DUAL_WIELD))
2465 return 0;
2466 else
2467 return INV_ERR_CANT_DUAL_WIELD;
2468 }
2469 else
2470 {
2471 if (!skip_2h_check)
2472 return INV_ERR_CANT_EQUIP_WITH_TWOHANDED;
2473 else
2474 return 0;
2475 }
2476 }
2477 else
2478 {
2479 if (m_pOwner->hasSkillLine(SKILL_DUAL_WIELD))
2480 return 0;
2481 else
2482 return INV_ERR_CANT_DUAL_WIELD;
2483 }

2485 else if (type == INVTYPE_SHIELD || type == INVTYPE_HOLDABLE)
2486 {
2487 Item* mainweapon = GetInventoryItem(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND);
2488 if (mainweapon) //item exists
2489 {
2490 if (mainweapon->getItemProperties()->InventoryType != INVTYPE_2HWEAPON)
2491 {
2492 return 0;
2493 }
2494 else
2495 {
2496 if (!skip_2h_check)
2497 return INV_ERR_CANT_EQUIP_WITH_TWOHANDED;
2498 else
2499 return 0;
2500 }
2501 }
2502 else
2503 {
2504 return 0;
2505 }
2506 }
2507 else
2508 return INV_ERR_ITEM_DOESNT_GO_TO_SLOT;
2509 }
2510 case EQUIPMENT_SLOT_RANGED:
2511 {
2512 if (type == INVTYPE_RANGED || type == INVTYPE_THROWN || type == INVTYPE_RANGEDRIGHT || type == INVTYPE_RELIC)
2513 return 0;

2531 {

2533 {

2535 const uint8_t islot = GetInternalBankSlotFromPlayer(slot);
2536 if (slots < islot)
2537 {

2557 {

2601 {
2602 return 0;

2613 }

2618 }

2621 {
2622 if (type == INVTYPE_BAG)
2623 {

2632 case INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_1:

2705 case CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_13:

2727 {

2729 }

2739
2740/// Checks if player can receive the item
2741int8_t ItemInterface::CanReceiveItem(ItemProperties const* item, uint32_t amount)
2742{
2743 if (!item)
2744 {
2745 return INV_ERR_OK;
2746 }
2747
2748 if (item->Unique)
2749 {
2750 uint32_t count = GetItemCount(item->ItemId, true);
2751 if (count == item->Unique || ((count + amount) > item->Unique))
2752 {
2753 return INV_ERR_CANT_CARRY_MORE_OF_THIS;
2754 }
2755 }
2756
2757#if VERSION_STRING > TBC
2758 if (item->ItemLimitCategory > 0)
2759 {
2760 auto item_limit_category = sItemLimitCategoryStore.lookupEntry(item->ItemLimitCategory);
2761 if (item_limit_category && !(item_limit_category->equippedFlag & ILFLAG_EQUIP_ONLY))
2762 {
2763 uint32_t count = GetItemCountByLimitId(item_limit_category->Id, false);
2764 if (count >= item_limit_category->maxAmount || ((count + amount) > item_limit_category->maxAmount))
2765 return INV_ERR_ITEM_MAX_LIMIT_CATEGORY_COUNT_EXCEEDED;
2766 }
2767 }
2768#endif
2769
2770 return INV_ERR_OK;
2771}
2772
2773void ItemInterface::BuyItem(ItemProperties const* item, uint32_t total_amount, Creature* pVendor)
2774{
2775 if (item->BuyPrice)
2776 {
2777 uint32_t factionStanding = m_pOwner->getFactionStandingRank(pVendor->m_factionTemplate->Faction);
2778 uint32_t itemprice = item->getBuyPriceForItem(total_amount, factionStanding);
2779 if (!m_pOwner->hasEnoughCoinage(itemprice))
2780 m_pOwner->setCoinage(0);
2781 else
2782 m_pOwner->modCoinage(-(int32_t)itemprice);
2783 }
2784 auto item_extended_cost = pVendor->GetItemExtendedCostByItemId(item->ItemId);
2785 if (item_extended_cost != nullptr)
2786 {
2787 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < 5; ++i)
2788 {
2789 if (item_extended_cost->item[i])
2790 m_pOwner->getItemInterface()->RemoveItemAmt(item_extended_cost->item[i], total_amount * item_extended_cost->count[i]);
2791 }
2792
2793#if VERSION_STRING > Classic
2794#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
2795 if (m_pOwner->getHonorCurrency() >= (item_extended_cost->honor_points * total_amount))
2796 {
2797 m_pOwner->modHonorCurrency(-int32_t((item_extended_cost->honor_points * total_amount)));
2798 m_pOwner->removeArenaPoints(item_extended_cost->honor_points * total_amount, true);
2799 }
2800
2801 if (m_pOwner->getArenaCurrency() >= item_extended_cost->arena_points * total_amount)
2802 {
2803 m_pOwner->modArenaCurrency(-int32_t(item_extended_cost->arena_points * total_amount));
2804 m_pOwner->removeArenaPoints(item_extended_cost->arena_points * total_amount, true);
2805 }
2806#endif
2807#endif
2808 }
2809}
2810
2811int8_t ItemInterface::CanAffordItem(ItemProperties const* item, uint32_t amount, Creature* pVendor)
2812{
2813 auto item_extended_cost = pVendor->GetItemExtendedCostByItemId(item->ItemId);
2814 if (item_extended_cost != nullptr)
2815 {
2816 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < 5; ++i)
2817 {
2818 if (item_extended_cost->item[i])
2819 {
2820 if (m_pOwner->getItemInterface()->GetItemCount(item_extended_cost->item[i], false) < (item_extended_cost->count[i] * amount))
2821 return INV_ERR_VENDOR_MISSING_TURNINS;
2822 }
2823 }
2824
2825#if VERSION_STRING > Classic
2826#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
2827 if (m_pOwner->getHonorCurrency() < (item_extended_cost->honor_points * amount))
2828 return INV_ERR_NOT_ENOUGH_HONOR_POINTS;
2829
2830 if (m_pOwner->getArenaCurrency() < item_extended_cost->arena_points * amount)
2831 return INV_ERR_NOT_ENOUGH_ARENA_POINTS;
2832#endif
2833#endif
2834 if (m_pOwner->getMaxPersonalRating() < item_extended_cost->personalrating)
2835 return INV_ERR_PERSONAL_ARENA_RATING_TOO_LOW;
2836 }
2837
2838 if (item->BuyPrice)
2839 {
2840 uint32_t factionStanding = m_pOwner->getFactionStandingRank(pVendor->m_factionTemplate->Faction);
2841 uint32_t price = item->getBuyPriceForItem(amount, factionStanding) * amount;
2842 if (!m_pOwner->hasEnoughCoinage(price))
2843 {
2844 return INV_ERR_NOT_ENOUGH_MONEY;
2845 }
2846 }
2847
2848 if (item->RequiredFaction)
2849 {
2850 WDB::Structures::FactionEntry const* factdbc = sFactionStore.lookupEntry(item->RequiredFaction);
2851 if (!factdbc || factdbc->RepListId < 0)
2852 return INV_ERR_OK;
2853
2854 if (m_pOwner->getReputationRankFromStanding(m_pOwner->getFactionStanding(item->RequiredFaction)) < (int32_t)item->RequiredFactionStanding)
2855 {
2856 return INV_ERR_ITEM_REPUTATION_NOT_ENOUGH;
2857 }
2858 }
2859 return INV_ERR_OK;
2860}

2862// Gets the Item slot by item type
2863int8_t ItemInterface::GetItemSlotByType(uint32_t type)
2864{
2865 switch (type)
2866 {
2867 case INVTYPE_NON_EQUIP:
2868 return ITEM_NO_SLOT_AVAILABLE;
2869 case INVTYPE_HEAD:
2870 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_HEAD;
2871 case INVTYPE_NECK:
2872 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_NECK;
2873 case INVTYPE_SHOULDERS:
2874 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_SHOULDERS;
2875 case INVTYPE_BODY:
2876 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_BODY;
2877 case INVTYPE_CHEST:
2878 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_CHEST;
2879 case INVTYPE_ROBE: // ???
2880 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_CHEST;
2881 case INVTYPE_WAIST:
2882 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_WAIST;
2883 case INVTYPE_LEGS:
2884 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_LEGS;
2885 case INVTYPE_FEET:
2886 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_FEET;
2887 case INVTYPE_WRISTS:
2888 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_WRISTS;
2889 case INVTYPE_HANDS:
2890 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_HANDS;
2891 case INVTYPE_FINGER:
2892 {
2893 if (!GetInventoryItem(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_FINGER1))
2894 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_FINGER1;
2895 if (!GetInventoryItem(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_FINGER2))
2896 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_FINGER2;
2897
2898 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_FINGER1; //auto equips always in finger 1
2899 }
2900 case INVTYPE_TRINKET:
2901 {
2902 if (!GetInventoryItem(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_TRINKET1))
2903 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_TRINKET1;
2904 if (!GetInventoryItem(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_TRINKET2))
2905 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_TRINKET2;
2906
2907 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_TRINKET1; //auto equips always on trinket 1
2908 }
2909 case INVTYPE_CLOAK:
2910 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_BACK;
2911 case INVTYPE_SHIELD:
2912 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND;
2913 case INVTYPE_RANGED:
2914 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_RANGED;
2915 case INVTYPE_WEAPON:
2916 case INVTYPE_2HWEAPON:
2917 {
2918 if (!GetInventoryItem(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND))
2919 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND;
2920 if (!GetInventoryItem(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND))
2921 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND;
2922
2923 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND;
2924 }
2925 case INVTYPE_TABARD:
2926 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_TABARD;
2927 case INVTYPE_WEAPONMAINHAND:
2928 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND;
2929 case INVTYPE_WEAPONOFFHAND:
2930 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND;
2931 case INVTYPE_HOLDABLE:
2932 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND;
2933 case INVTYPE_THROWN:
2934 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_RANGED; // ?
2935 case INVTYPE_RANGEDRIGHT:
2936 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_RANGED; // ?
2937 case INVTYPE_RELIC:
2938 return EQUIPMENT_SLOT_RANGED;
2939 case INVTYPE_BAG:
2940 {
2941 for (int8_t i = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; i++)
2942 {
2943 if (!GetInventoryItem(i))
2944 return i;
2945 }
2946 return ITEM_NO_SLOT_AVAILABLE; //bags are not supposed to be auto-equipped when slots are not free
2947 }
2948 default:
2949 return ITEM_NO_SLOT_AVAILABLE;
2950 }
2951}

2953/// Gets a Item by guid
2954Item* ItemInterface::GetItemByGUID(uint64_t Guid)
2955{
2956 uint32_t i;
2957
2958 //EQUIPMENT
2959 for (i = EQUIPMENT_SLOT_START; i < EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END; ++i)
2960 {
2961 if (m_pItems[i] != nullptr)
2962 {
2963 if (m_pItems[i]->getGuid() == Guid)
2964 {
2965 m_result.ContainerSlot = static_cast<int8_t>(INVALID_BACKPACK_SLOT);//not a containerslot. In 1.8 client marked wrong slot like this
2966 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
2967 return m_pItems[i].get();
2968 }
2969 }
2970 }
2971
2972 //INVENTORY BAGS
2973 for (i = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
2974 {
2975 if (m_pItems[i] != nullptr && m_pItems[i]->isContainer())
2976 {
2977 if (m_pItems[i]->getGuid() == Guid)
2978 {
2979 m_result.ContainerSlot = static_cast<int8_t>(INVALID_BACKPACK_SLOT);
2980 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
2981 return m_pItems[i].get();
2982 }
2983
2984 for (uint32_t j = 0; j < m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++j)
2985 {
2986 Item* item2 = (static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[i].get()))->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(j));
2987 if (item2)
2988 {
2989 if (item2->getGuid() == Guid)
2990 {
2991 m_result.ContainerSlot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
2992 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(j);
2993 return item2;
2994 }
2995 }
2996 }
2997 }
2998 }
2999
3000 //INVENTORY
3001 for (i = INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
3002 {
3003 if (m_pItems[i] != nullptr)
3004 {
3005 if (m_pItems[i]->getGuid() == Guid)
3006 {
3007 m_result.ContainerSlot = static_cast<int8_t>(INVALID_BACKPACK_SLOT);
3008 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
3009 return m_pItems[i].get();
3010 }
3011 }
3012 }
3013
3014 //Keyring
3015 for (i = INVENTORY_KEYRING_START; i < INVENTORY_KEYRING_END; ++i)
3016 {
3017 if (m_pItems[i] != nullptr)
3018 {
3019 if (m_pItems[i]->getGuid() == Guid)
3020 {
3021 m_result.ContainerSlot = static_cast<int8_t>(INVALID_BACKPACK_SLOT);
3022 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
3023 return m_pItems[i].get();
3024 }
3025 }
3026 }
3027
3028 //Currency
3029 for (i = CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_START; i < CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_END; ++i)
3030 {
3031 if (m_pItems[i] != nullptr)
3032 {
3033 if (m_pItems[i]->getGuid() == Guid)
3034 {
3035 m_result.ContainerSlot = static_cast<int8_t>(INVALID_BACKPACK_SLOT);
3036 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
3037 return m_pItems[i].get();
3038 }
3039 }
3040 }
3041 return nullptr;
3042}
3043
3044void ItemInterface::EmptyBuyBack()
3045{
3046 for (uint8_t j = 0; j < MAX_BUYBACK_SLOT; ++j)
3047 {
3048 if (m_pBuyBack[j] != nullptr)
3049 {
3050 m_pOwner->sendDestroyObjectPacket(m_pBuyBack[j]->getGuid());
3051 m_pBuyBack[j]->deleteFromDB();
3052
3053 if (m_pBuyBack[j]->isContainer())
3054 {
3055 if (m_pBuyBack[j]->IsInWorld())
3056 m_pBuyBack[j]->removeFromWorld();
3057 }
3058 else
3059 {
3060 if (m_pBuyBack[j]->IsInWorld())
3061 m_pBuyBack[j]->removeFromWorld();
3062 }
3063
3064 m_pOwner->setVendorBuybackSlot(j, 0);
3065 m_pOwner->setBuybackPriceSlot(j, 0);
3066 m_pOwner->setBuybackTimestampSlot(j, 0);
3067 m_pBuyBack[j] = nullptr;
3068 }
3069 else
3070 break;
3071 }
3072}
3073
3074void ItemInterface::AddBuyBackItem(std::unique_ptr<Item> it, uint32_t price)
3075{
3076 // If all slots are used, first set buyback item gets removed and new one gets added on last position
3077 if ((m_pBuyBack[MAX_BUYBACK_SLOT - 1] != nullptr) && (m_pOwner->getVendorBuybackSlot(MAX_BUYBACK_SLOT - 1) != 0))
3078 {
3079 if (m_pBuyBack[0] != nullptr)
3080 {
3081 m_pOwner->sendDestroyObjectPacket(m_pBuyBack[0]->getGuid());
3082 m_pBuyBack[0]->deleteFromDB();
3083
3084 if (m_pBuyBack[0]->isContainer())
3085 {
3086 if (m_pBuyBack[0]->IsInWorld())
3087 m_pBuyBack[0]->removeFromWorld();
3088 }
3089 else
3090 {
3091 if (m_pBuyBack[0]->IsInWorld())
3092 m_pBuyBack[0]->removeFromWorld();
3093 }
3094
3095 m_pBuyBack[0] = nullptr;
3096 }
3097
3098 for (uint8_t j = 0; j < MAX_BUYBACK_SLOT - 1; ++j)
3099 {
3100 m_pOwner->setVendorBuybackSlot(j, m_pOwner->getVendorBuybackSlot(j + 1));
3101 m_pOwner->setBuybackPriceSlot(j, m_pOwner->getBuybackPriceSlot(j + 1));
3102 m_pOwner->setBuybackTimestampSlot(j, m_pOwner->getBuybackTimestampSlot(j + 1));
3103 m_pBuyBack[j] = std::move(m_pBuyBack[j + 1]);
3104 }
3105 m_pBuyBack[MAX_BUYBACK_SLOT - 1] = std::move(it);
3106
3107 m_pOwner->setVendorBuybackSlot(MAX_BUYBACK_SLOT - 1, m_pBuyBack[MAX_BUYBACK_SLOT - 1]->getGuid());
3108 m_pOwner->setBuybackPriceSlot(MAX_BUYBACK_SLOT - 1, price);
3109 m_pOwner->setBuybackTimestampSlot(MAX_BUYBACK_SLOT - 1, static_cast<uint32_t>(UNIXTIME));
3110 }
3111 else
3112 {
3113 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_BUYBACK_SLOT - 1; ++i) //at least 1 slot is empty
3114 {
3115 if (m_pOwner->getVendorBuybackSlot(i) == 0 || m_pBuyBack[i] == nullptr)
3116 {
3117 sLogger.info("setting buybackslot {}", i / 2);
3118 m_pBuyBack[i] = std::move(it);
3119
3120 // TODO: there are actually 24 slots -Appled
3121 // arcemu: m_pOwner->SetUInt64Value(PLAYER_FIELD_VENDORBUYBACK_SLOT_1 + (2 * j), m_pOwner->GetUInt64Value(PLAYER_FIELD_VENDORBUYBACK_SLOT_1 + ((j + 1) * 2)));
3122 m_pOwner->setVendorBuybackSlot(i, m_pBuyBack[i]->getGuid());
3123 m_pOwner->setBuybackPriceSlot(i, price);
3124 m_pOwner->setBuybackTimestampSlot(i, static_cast<uint32_t>(UNIXTIME));
3125 return;
3126 }
3127 }
3128 }
3129}
