3131std::unique_ptr<Item> ItemInterface::RemoveBuyBackItem(uint8_t index)
3132{
3133 if (index >= MAX_BUYBACK_SLOT)
3134 return nullptr;
3135
3136 uint8_t j = 0;
3137 std::unique_ptr<Item> itemHolder = std::move(m_pBuyBack[index]);
3138 for (j = index; j < MAX_BUYBACK_SLOT - 1; ++j)
3139 {
3140 if (m_pOwner->getVendorBuybackSlot(j) != 0)
3141 {
3142 m_pOwner->setVendorBuybackSlot(j, m_pOwner->getVendorBuybackSlot(j + 1));
3143 m_pOwner->setBuybackPriceSlot(j, m_pOwner->getBuybackPriceSlot(j + 1));
3144 m_pOwner->setBuybackTimestampSlot(j, m_pOwner->getBuybackTimestampSlot(j + 1));
3145
3146 if (m_pBuyBack[j + 1] != nullptr && m_pOwner->getVendorBuybackSlot(j + 1) != 0)
3147 {
3148 m_pBuyBack[j] = std::move(m_pBuyBack[j + 1]);
3149 }
3150 else
3151 {
3152 m_pBuyBack[j] = nullptr;
3153
3154 sLogger.info("nulling {}", j);
3155 }
3156 }
3157 else
3158 return itemHolder;
3159 }
3160
3161 j = 11;
3162 m_pOwner->setVendorBuybackSlot(j, 0);
3163 m_pOwner->setBuybackPriceSlot(j, 0);
3164 m_pOwner->setBuybackTimestampSlot(j, 0);
3165
3166 return itemHolder;
3167}
3168
3169/// Swap inventory slots
3170void ItemInterface::SwapItemSlots(int8_t srcslot, int8_t dstslot)
3171{
3172 // srcslot and dstslot are int... NULL might not be an int depending on arch where it is compiled
3173 if (srcslot >= INVENTORY_KEYRING_END || srcslot < 0)
3174 return;
3175
3176 if (dstslot >= INVENTORY_KEYRING_END || dstslot < 0)
3177 return;
3178
3179 Item* SrcItem = GetInventoryItem(srcslot);
3180 Item* DstItem = GetInventoryItem(dstslot);
3181
3182 sLogger.debug("ItemInterface::SwapItemSlots({}, {});", srcslot, dstslot);
3183 //Item * temp = GetInventoryItem(srcslot);
3184 //if (temp)
3185 // sLogger.debug("Source item: {} (inventoryType={}, realslot={});" , temp->GetProto()->Name1 , temp->GetProto()->InventoryType , GetItemSlotByType(temp->GetProto()->InventoryType));
3186 // temp = GetInventoryItem(dstslot);
3187 //if (temp)
3188 // sLogger.debug("Destination: Item: {} (inventoryType={}, realslot={});" , temp->GetProto()->Name1 , temp->GetProto()->InventoryType , GetItemSlotByType(temp->GetProto()->InventoryType));
3189 //else
3190 // sLogger.debug("Destination: Empty");
3191
3192 // don't stack equipped items (even with hasItemStackCheat), just swap them
3193 uint32_t srcItemMaxStack, dstItemMaxStack;
3194 if (SrcItem != nullptr)
3195 {
3196 if (srcslot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END || !(SrcItem->getOwner()->m_cheats.hasItemStackCheat))
3197 {
3198 srcItemMaxStack = SrcItem->getItemProperties()->MaxCount;
3199 }
3200 else
3201 {
3202 srcItemMaxStack = 0x7fffffff;
3203 }
3204 }
3205 else
3206 {
3207 srcItemMaxStack = 0;
3208 }
3209 if (DstItem != nullptr)
3210 {
3211 if (dstslot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END || !(DstItem->getOwner()->m_cheats.hasItemStackCheat))
3212 {
3213 dstItemMaxStack = DstItem->getItemProperties()->MaxCount;
3214 }
3215 else
3216 {
3217 dstItemMaxStack = 0x7fffffff;
3218 }
3219 }
3220 else
3221 {
3222 dstItemMaxStack = 0;
3223 }
3224
3225 if (SrcItem != nullptr && DstItem != nullptr && SrcItem->getEntry() == DstItem->getEntry() && srcItemMaxStack > 1 && SrcItem->m_wrappedItemId == 0 && DstItem->m_wrappedItemId == 0)
3226 {
3227 uint32_t total = SrcItem->getStackCount() + DstItem->getStackCount();
3228 if (total <= dstItemMaxStack)
3229 {
3230 DstItem->modStackCount(SrcItem->getStackCount());
3231 SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, srcslot);
3232 DstItem->m_isDirty = true;
3233 return;
3234 }
3235 else
3236 {
3237 if (DstItem->getStackCount() == dstItemMaxStack)
3238 {
3239
3240 }
3241 else
3242 {
3243 int32_t delta = dstItemMaxStack - DstItem->getStackCount();
3244 DstItem->setStackCount(dstItemMaxStack);
3245 SrcItem->modStackCount(-delta);
3246 SrcItem->m_isDirty = true;
3247 DstItem->m_isDirty = true;
3248 return;
3249 }
3250 }
3251 }
3252
3253 //src item was equipped previously
3254 if (srcslot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END)
3255 {
3256 if (m_pItems[(int)srcslot] != nullptr)
3257 m_pOwner->applyItemMods(m_pItems[srcslot].get(), srcslot, false);
3258 }
3259
3260 //dst item was equipped previously
3261 if (dstslot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END)
3262 {
3263 if (m_pItems[(int)dstslot] != nullptr)
3264 m_pOwner->applyItemMods(m_pItems[dstslot].get(), dstslot, false);
3265 }
3266
3267 //sLogger.debug("Putting items into slots...");
3268
3269 std::unique_ptr<Item> tmpDstItemHolder = std::move(m_pItems[dstslot]);
3270 m_pItems[dstslot] = std::move(m_pItems[srcslot]);
3271
3272 // Moving a bag with items to a empty bagslot
3273 if (tmpDstItemHolder == nullptr && SrcItem != nullptr && SrcItem->isContainer())
3274 {
3275 std::unique_ptr<Item> tSrcItem;
3276
3277 for (uint32_t Slot = 0; Slot < SrcItem->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++Slot)
3278 {
3279 tSrcItem = m_pOwner->getItemInterface()->SafeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot(srcslot, static_cast<int16_t>(Slot), false);
3280 if (tSrcItem != nullptr)
3281 {
3282 const auto [result, returnedItem] = m_pOwner->getItemInterface()->SafeAddItem(std::move(tSrcItem), dstslot, static_cast<int16_t>(Slot));
3283 if (!result)
3284 {
3285 // TODO: if add failed, should item be sent in mail to player? now it's destroyed -Appled
3286 sLogger.failure("Error while adding item {} to player {}", returnedItem->getEntry(), m_pOwner->getName());
3287 return;
3288 }
3289 }
3290 }
3291 }
3292
3293 m_pItems[srcslot] = std::move(tmpDstItemHolder);
3294
3295 // swapping 2 bags filled with items
3296 if (DstItem != nullptr && SrcItem != nullptr && SrcItem->isContainer() && DstItem->isContainer())
3297 {
3298 std::unique_ptr<Item> tDstItem;
3299 std::unique_ptr<Item> tSrcItem;
3300 uint32_t TotalSlots = 0;
3301
3302 // Determine the max amount of slots to swap
3303 if (SrcItem->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots > DstItem->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots)
3304 TotalSlots = SrcItem->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots;
3305 else
3306 TotalSlots = DstItem->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots;
3307
3308 // swap items in the bags
3309 for (uint32_t Slot = 0; Slot < TotalSlots; ++Slot)
3310 {
3311 tSrcItem = m_pOwner->getItemInterface()->SafeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot(srcslot, static_cast<int16_t>(Slot), false);
3312 tDstItem = m_pOwner->getItemInterface()->SafeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot(dstslot, static_cast<int16_t>(Slot), false);
3313
3314 // TODO: if add failed, should items be sent in mail to player? now they are destroyed -Appled
3315 if (tSrcItem != nullptr)
3316 (static_cast<Container*>(DstItem))->addItem(static_cast<int16_t>(Slot), std::move(tSrcItem));
3317 if (tDstItem != nullptr)
3318 (static_cast<Container*>(SrcItem))->addItem(static_cast<int16_t>(Slot), std::move(tDstItem));
3319 }
3320 }
3321
3322 if (DstItem != nullptr)
3323 DstItem->m_isDirty = true;
3324 if (SrcItem != nullptr)
3325 SrcItem->m_isDirty = true;
3326
3327 if (m_pItems[(int)dstslot] != nullptr)
3328 {
3329 //sLogger.debug("(SrcItem) PLAYER_FIELD_INV_SLOT_HEAD + {} is now {}" , dstslot , m_pItems[(int)dstslot]->getGuid());
3330 setOwnerInventoryItem(static_cast<uint8_t>(dstslot), m_pItems[(int)dstslot]->getGuid());
3331 }
3332 else
3333 {
3334 //sLogger.debug("(SrcItem) PLAYER_FIELD_INV_SLOT_HEAD + {} is now 0" , dstslot);
3335 setOwnerInventoryItem(static_cast<uint8_t>(dstslot), 0);
3336 }
3337
3338 if (m_pItems[(int)srcslot] != nullptr)
3339 {
3340 //sLogger.debug("(DstItem) PLAYER_FIELD_INV_SLOT_HEAD + {} is now {}" , dstslot , m_pItems[(int)srcslot]->getGuid());
3341 setOwnerInventoryItem(static_cast<uint8_t>(srcslot), m_pItems[(int)srcslot]->getGuid());
3342 }
3343 else
3344 {
3345 //sLogger.debug("(DstItem) PLAYER_FIELD_INV_SLOT_HEAD + {} is now 0" , dstslot);
3346 setOwnerInventoryItem(static_cast<uint8_t>(srcslot), 0);
3347 }
3348
3349 if (srcslot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END) // source item is equipped
3350 {
3351 if (m_pItems[srcslot]) // dstitem goes into here.
3352 {
3353 // Bags aren't considered "visible".
3354 if (srcslot < EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END)
3355 {
3356 m_pOwner->setVisibleItemFields(static_cast<uint32_t>(srcslot), m_pItems[srcslot].get());
3357 }
3358
3359 // handle bind on equip
3360 if (m_pItems[srcslot]->getItemProperties()->Bonding == ITEM_BIND_ON_EQUIP)
3361 m_pItems[srcslot]->addFlags(ITEM_FLAG_SOULBOUND);
3362 }
3363 else
3364 {
3365 // Bags aren't considered "visible".
3366 if (srcslot < EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END)
3367 {
3368 m_pOwner->setVisibleItemFields(static_cast<uint32_t>(srcslot), nullptr);
3369 }
3370 }
3371 }
3372
3373 if (dstslot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END) // source item is inside inventory
3374 {
3375 if (m_pItems[(int)dstslot] != nullptr) // srcitem goes into here.
3376 {
3377 // Bags aren't considered "visible".
3378 if (dstslot < EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END)
3379 {
3380 m_pOwner->setVisibleItemFields(static_cast<uint32_t>(dstslot), m_pItems[dstslot].get());
3381 }
3382
3383 // handle bind on equip
3384 if (m_pItems[(int)dstslot]->getItemProperties()->Bonding == ITEM_BIND_ON_EQUIP)
3385 m_pItems[(int)dstslot]->addFlags(ITEM_FLAG_SOULBOUND);
3386
3387 }
3388 else
3389 {
3390
3391 // bags aren't considered visible
3392 if (dstslot < EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END)
3393 {
3394 m_pOwner->setVisibleItemFields(static_cast<uint32_t>(dstslot), nullptr);
3395 }
3396 }
3397 }
3398 // handle dual wield
3399 if (dstslot == EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND || srcslot == EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND)
3400 {
3401 if (m_pItems[EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND] != nullptr && m_pItems[EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND]->getItemProperties()->Class == ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON)
3402 {
3403 /////////////////////////////////////////// Titan's grip stuff ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3404 uint32_t subclass = m_pItems[EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND]->getItemProperties()->SubClass;
3405 if (subclass == ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_TWOHAND_AXE || subclass == ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_TWOHAND_MACE || subclass == ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_TWOHAND_SWORD)
3406 {
3407 m_pOwner->castSpell(m_pOwner, 49152, true);
3408 }
3409 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3410 }
3411 }
3412
3413 // Update enchantment durations
3414 if (m_pItems[(int)srcslot] != nullptr)
3415 sendEnchantDurations(m_pItems[(int)srcslot].get());
3416 if (m_pItems[(int)dstslot] != nullptr)
3417 sendEnchantDurations(m_pItems[(int)dstslot].get());
3418
3419 //src item is equipped now
3420 if (srcslot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END)
3421 {
3422 if (m_pItems[(int)srcslot] != nullptr)
3423 m_pOwner->applyItemMods(m_pItems[srcslot].get(), srcslot, true);
3424 else if (srcslot == EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND || srcslot == EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND)
3425 m_pOwner->calculateDamage();
3426 }
3427
3428 //dst item is equipped now
3429 if (dstslot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END)
3430 {
3431 if (m_pItems[(int)dstslot] != nullptr)
3432 m_pOwner->applyItemMods(m_pItems[dstslot].get(), dstslot, true);
3433 else if (dstslot == EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND || dstslot == EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND)
3434 m_pOwner->calculateDamage();
3435 }
3436
3437 //Recalculate Expertise (for Weapon specs)
3438 m_pOwner->calcExpertise();
3439}
3440
3441/// Item Loading
3442void ItemInterface::mLoadItemsFromDatabase(QueryResult* result)
3443{
3444 int8_t containerslot, slot;
3445
3446 if (result)
3447 {
3448 do
3449 {
3450 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3451
3452 containerslot = fields[13].asInt8();
3453 slot = fields[14].asInt8();
3454
3455 ItemProperties const* proto = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(fields[2].asUint32());
3456 if (proto != nullptr)
3457 {
3458 std::unique_ptr<Item> item;
3459 if (proto->InventoryType == INVTYPE_BAG)
3460 {
3461 item = std::make_unique<Container>(HIGHGUID_TYPE_CONTAINER, fields[1].asUint32());
3462 static_cast<Container*>(item.get())->loadFromDB(fields);
3463 }
3464 else
3465 {
3466 item = std::make_unique<Item>();
3467 item->init(HIGHGUID_TYPE_ITEM, fields[1].asUint32());
3468 item->loadFromDB(fields, m_pOwner, false);
3469 }
3470
3471 // if we encounter an item that expired, we remove it from db
3472 if (item->getItemExpireTime() > 0 && UNIXTIME > item->getItemExpireTime())
3473 {
3474 item->deleteFromDB();
3475 continue;
3476 }
3477
3478 auto* itemPtr = item.get();
3479 const auto [addResult, _] = SafeAddItem(std::move(item), containerslot, slot);
3480 if (addResult)
3481 itemPtr->m_isDirty = false;
3482 }
3483 } while (result->NextRow());
3484 }
3485}
3486
3487/// Item saving
3488void ItemInterface::mSaveItemsToDatabase(bool first, QueryBuffer* buf)
3489{
3490 // Make sure durations of temporary enchanted items are saved to db
3491 sendEnchantDurations();
3492
3493 int16_t x;
3494
3495 for (x = EQUIPMENT_SLOT_START; x < CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_END; ++x)
3496 {
3497 if (GetInventoryItem(x) != nullptr)
3498 {
3499 if (IsBagSlot(x) && GetInventoryItem(x)->isContainer())
3500 {
3501 static_cast<Container*>(GetInventoryItem(x))->saveToDB(static_cast<int8_t>(x), first, buf);
3502 }
3503 else
3504 {
3505 GetInventoryItem(x)->saveToDB(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, static_cast<int8_t>(x), first, buf);
3506 }
3507 }
3508 }
3509}
3510
3511std::tuple<AddItemResult, std::unique_ptr<Item>> ItemInterface::AddItemToFreeBankSlot(std::unique_ptr<Item> itemHolder)
3512{
3513 //special items first
3514 for (uint32_t i = BANK_SLOT_BAG_START; i < BANK_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
3515 {
3516 if (m_pItems[i] != nullptr)
3517 {
3518 if (m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->BagFamily & itemHolder->getItemProperties()->BagFamily)
3519 {
3520 if (m_pItems[i]->isContainer())
3521 {
3522 auto [result, returnedItem] = static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[i].get())->addItemToFreeSlot(std::move(itemHolder), NULL);
3523 if (result)
3524 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_OK, nullptr };
3525 else
3526 itemHolder = std::move(returnedItem);
3527 }
3528 }
3529 }
3530 }
3531
3532 for (int16_t i = BANK_SLOT_ITEM_START; i < BANK_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
3533 {
3534 if (m_pItems[i] == nullptr)
3535 {
3536 return SafeAddItem(std::move(itemHolder), INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, i);
3537 }
3538 }
3539
3540 for (uint32_t i = BANK_SLOT_BAG_START; i < BANK_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
3541 {
3542 if (m_pItems[i] != nullptr && m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->BagFamily == 0 && m_pItems[i]->isContainer()) //special bags ignored
3543 {
3544 for (uint32_t j = 0; j < m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++j)
3545 {
3546 Item* item2 = static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[i].get())->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(j));
3547 if (item2 == nullptr)
3548 {
3549 return SafeAddItem(std::move(itemHolder), static_cast<int8_t>(i), static_cast<int16_t>(j));
3550 }
3551 }
3552 }
3553 }
3554 return { ADD_ITEM_RESULT_ERROR, std::move(itemHolder) };
3555}

3595
3596SlotResult ItemInterface::FindFreeInventorySlot(ItemProperties const* proto)
3597{
3598 //special item
3599 //special slots will be ignored of item is not set
3600 if (proto != nullptr)
3601 {
3602 //sLogger.debug("ItemInterface::FindFreeInventorySlot called for item {}" , proto->Name1);
3603 if (proto->BagFamily)
3604 {
3605 if (proto->BagFamily & ITEM_TYPE_KEYRING || proto->Class == ITEM_CLASS_KEY)
3606 {
3607 for (uint32_t i = INVENTORY_KEYRING_START; i < INVENTORY_KEYRING_END; ++i)
3608 {
3609 if (m_pItems[i] == nullptr)
3610 {
3611 m_result.ContainerSlot = ITEM_NO_SLOT_AVAILABLE;
3612 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
3613 m_result.Result = true;
3614 return m_result;
3615 }
3616 }
3617 }
3618 else if (proto->BagFamily & ITEM_TYPE_CURRENCY)
3619 {
3620 for (uint32_t i = CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_START; i < CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_END; ++i)
3621 {
3622 if (m_pItems[i] == nullptr)
3623 {
3624 m_result.ContainerSlot = ITEM_NO_SLOT_AVAILABLE;
3625 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
3626 m_result.Result = true;
3627 return m_result;
3628 }
3629 }
3630 }
3631 else
3632 {
3633 for (uint32_t i = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
3634 {
3635 if (m_pItems[i] != nullptr && m_pItems[i]->isContainer())
3636 {
3637 if (m_pItems[i]->getItemProperties()->BagFamily & proto->BagFamily)
3638 {
3639 int32_t slot = static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[i].get())->findFreeSlot();
3640 if (slot != ITEM_NO_SLOT_AVAILABLE)
3641 {
3642 m_result.ContainerSlot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
3643 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(slot);
3644 m_result.Result = true;
3645 return m_result;
3646 }
3647 }
3648 }
3649 }
3650 }
3651 }
3652 }
3653
3654 //backpack
3655 for (uint32_t i = INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
3656 {
3657 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
3658 if (item == nullptr)
3659 {
3660 m_result.ContainerSlot = ITEM_NO_SLOT_AVAILABLE;
3661 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
3662 m_result.Result = true;
3663 return m_result;
3664 }
3665 }
3666
3667 //bags
3668 for (uint32_t i = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
3669 {
3670 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
3671 if (item != nullptr)
3672 {
3673 if (item->isContainer() && !item->getItemProperties()->BagFamily)
3674 {
3675 int32_t slot = static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[i].get())->findFreeSlot();
3676 if (slot != ITEM_NO_SLOT_AVAILABLE)
3677 {
3678 m_result.ContainerSlot = static_cast<int8_t>(i);
3679 m_result.Slot = static_cast<int8_t>(slot);
3680 m_result.Result = true;
3681 return m_result;
3682 }
3683 }
3684 }
3685 }
3686
3687 m_result.ContainerSlot = ITEM_NO_SLOT_AVAILABLE;
3688 m_result.Slot = ITEM_NO_SLOT_AVAILABLE;
3689 m_result.Result = false;
3690
3691 return m_result;
3692}

3779
3780void ItemInterface::ReduceItemDurability()
3781{
3782 uint32_t f = Util::getRandomUInt(100);
3783 if (f <= 10) //10% chance to loose 1 dur from a random valid item.
3784 {
3785 int32_t slot = static_cast<int32_t>(Util::getRandomUInt(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END));
3786 Item* pItem = GetInventoryItem(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, static_cast<int16_t>(slot));
3787 if (pItem != nullptr)
3788 {
3789 if (pItem->getDurability() && pItem->getMaxDurability())
3790 {
3791 pItem->setDurability(pItem->getMaxDurability() - 1);
3792 pItem->m_isDirty = true;
3793 //check final durability
3794 if (!pItem->getDurability()) //no dur left
3795 {
3796 m_pOwner->applyItemMods(pItem, static_cast<int16_t>(slot), false, true);
3797
3798 }
3799 }
3800 }
3801 }
3802}
3803
3804bool ItemInterface::IsEquipped(uint32_t itemid)
3805{
3806 for (uint32_t x = EQUIPMENT_SLOT_START; x < EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END; ++x)
3807 {
3808 Item* it = m_pItems[x].get();
3809
3810 if (it != nullptr)
3811 {
3812 if (it->getItemProperties()->ItemId == itemid)
3813 return true;
3814
3815#if VERSION_STRING > Classic
3816 // check gems as well
3817 for (uint8_t count = 0; count < it->getSocketSlotCount(); count++)
3818 {
3819 const auto ei = it->getEnchantment(static_cast<EnchantmentSlot>(SOCK_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT1 + count));
3820
3821 if (ei && ei->Enchantment)
3822 {
3823 ItemProperties const* ip = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(ei->Enchantment->GemEntry);
3824 if (ip && ip->ItemId == itemid)
3825 return true;
3826 }
3827 }
3828#endif
3829 }
3830 }
3831 return false;
3832}
3833
3834void ItemInterface::CheckAreaItems()
3835{
3836 for (uint32_t x = EQUIPMENT_SLOT_START; x < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++x)
3837 {
3838 if (m_pItems[x] != nullptr)
3839 {
3840 if (IsBagSlot(static_cast<int16_t>(x)) && m_pItems[x]->isContainer())
3841 {
3842 Container* bag = static_cast<Container*>(m_pItems[x].get());
3843
3844 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < bag->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++i)
3845 {
3846 if (bag->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i)) != nullptr && bag->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i))->getItemProperties()->MapID && bag->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i))->getItemProperties()->MapID != GetOwner()->GetMapId())
3847 bag->safeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
3848 }
3849 }
3850 else
3851 {
3852 if (m_pItems[x]->getItemProperties()->MapID && m_pItems[x]->getItemProperties()->MapID != GetOwner()->GetMapId())
3853 SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET, static_cast<int16_t>(x));
3854 }
3855 }
3856 }
3857}
3858
3859uint32_t ItemInterface::GetEquippedCountByItemLimit(uint32_t LimitId)
3860{
3861 uint32_t count = 0;
3862#if VERSION_STRING > Classic
3863 for (uint32_t x = EQUIPMENT_SLOT_START; x < EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END; ++x)
3864 {
3865 Item* it = m_pItems[x].get();
3866
3867 if (it != nullptr)
3868 {
3869 for (uint8_t socketcount = 0; socketcount < it->getSocketSlotCount(); socketcount++)
3870 {
3871 const auto ei = it->getEnchantment(static_cast<EnchantmentSlot>(SOCK_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT1 + count));
3872
3873 if (ei && ei->Enchantment)
3874 {
3875 ItemProperties const* ip = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(ei->Enchantment->GemEntry);
3876 if (ip && ip->ItemLimitCategory == LimitId)
3877 count++;
3878 }
3879 }
3880 }
3881 }
3882#endif
3883 return count;
3884}
3885
3886uint32_t ItemInterface::GetItemCountByLimitId(uint32_t LimitId, bool IncBank)
3887{
3888 uint32_t cnt = 0;
3889
3890 for (uint8_t i = EQUIPMENT_SLOT_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
3891 {
3892 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
3893 if (item != nullptr)
3894 {
3895 if (item->getItemProperties()->ItemLimitCategory == LimitId
3896 && item->m_wrappedItemId == 0)
3897 {
3898 cnt += item->getStackCount() ? item->getStackCount() : 1;
3899 }
3900 }
3901 }
3902
3903 for (uint8_t i = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
3904 {
3905 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
3906 if (item && item->isContainer())
3907 {
3908 for (uint32_t j = 0; j < item->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++j)
3909 {
3910 Item* item2 = (static_cast<Container*>(item))->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(j));
3911 if (item2 != nullptr)
3912 {
3913 if (item2->getItemProperties()->ItemLimitCategory == LimitId
3914 && item2->m_wrappedItemId == 0)
3915 {
3916 cnt += item2->getStackCount() ? item2->getStackCount() : 1;
3917 }
3918 }
3919 }
3920 }
3921 }
3922
3923 for (uint8_t i = INVENTORY_KEYRING_START; i < INVENTORY_KEYRING_END; ++i)
3924 {
3925 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
3926 if (item != nullptr)
3927 {
3928 if (item->getItemProperties()->ItemLimitCategory == LimitId
3929 && item->m_wrappedItemId == 0)
3930 {
3931 cnt += item->getStackCount() ? item->getStackCount() : 1;
3932 }
3933 }
3934 }
3935
3936 for (uint8_t i = CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_START; i < CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_END; ++i)
3937 {
3938 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
3939 if (item != nullptr)
3940 {
3941 if (item->getItemProperties()->ItemLimitCategory == LimitId
3942 && item->m_wrappedItemId == 0)
3943 {
3944 cnt += item->getStackCount() ? item->getStackCount() : 1;
3945 }
3946 }
3947 }
3948
3949 if (IncBank)
3950 {
3951 for (uint8_t i = BANK_SLOT_ITEM_START; i < BANK_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
3952 {
3953 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
3954 if (item != nullptr)
3955 {
3956 if (item->getItemProperties()->ItemLimitCategory == LimitId
3957 && item->m_wrappedItemId == 0)
3958 {
3959 cnt += item->getStackCount() ? item->getStackCount() : 1;
3960 }
3961 }
3962 }
3963
3964 for (uint8_t i = BANK_SLOT_BAG_START; i < BANK_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
3965 {
3966 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
3967 if (item != nullptr)
3968 {
3969 if (item->isContainer())
3970 {
3971 for (uint32_t j = 0; j < item->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++j)
3972 {
3973 Item* item2 = (static_cast<Container*>(item))->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(j));
3974 if (item2 != nullptr)
3975 {
3976 if (item2->getItemProperties()->ItemLimitCategory == LimitId
3977 && item2->m_wrappedItemId == 0)
3978 {
3979 cnt += item2->getStackCount() ? item2->getStackCount() : 1;
3980 }
3981 }
3982 }
3983 }
3984 }
3985 }
3986 }
3987 cnt += GetEquippedCountByItemLimit(LimitId);
3988
3989 return cnt;
3990}

3992/// Look for items with limited duration and send the remaining time to the client
3993void ItemInterface::HandleItemDurations()
3994{
3995
3996 for (uint16_t i = EQUIPMENT_SLOT_START; i <= CURRENCYTOKEN_SLOT_END; ++i)
3997 {
3998 Item* item1 = this->GetInventoryItem(static_cast<int16_t>(i));
3999 Item* realitem = nullptr;
4000
4001 if (item1 != nullptr && item1->isContainer())
4002 {
4003
4004 for (uint32_t j = 0; j < item1->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++j)
4005 {
4006 Item* item2 = dynamic_cast<Container*>(item1)->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(j));
4007
4008 if (item2 != nullptr && item2->getItemProperties()->ExistingDuration > 0)
4009 realitem = item2;
4010 }
4011
4012 }
4013 else
4014 {
4015 if (item1 != nullptr)
4016 realitem = item1;
4017 }
4018
4019 if (realitem != nullptr)
4020 sEventMgr.AddEvent(realitem, &Item::sendDurationUpdate, EVENT_SEND_PACKET_TO_PLAYER_AFTER_LOGIN, 0, 1, EVENT_FLAG_DO_NOT_EXECUTE_IN_WORLD_CONTEXT);
4021 }
4022}

4024/// Inserts a new entry into the RefundableMap. This should be called when purchasing the item
4025void ItemInterface::AddRefundable(uint64_t GUID, uint32_t extendedcost)
4026{
4027 std::pair< time_t, uint32_t > RefundableEntry;
4028 std::pair< uint64_t, std::pair< time_t, uint32_t > > insertpair;
4029
4030 Item* item = this->GetItemByGUID(GUID);
4031 if (item == nullptr)
4032 return;
4033
4034 uint32_t* played = this->GetOwner()->getPlayedTime();
4035
4036 RefundableEntry.first = played[1]; // time of purchase in playedtime
4037 RefundableEntry.second = extendedcost; // extendedcost
4038
4039 insertpair.first = GUID;
4040 insertpair.second = RefundableEntry;
4041
4042 this->m_refundableitems.insert(insertpair);
4043
4044 sEventMgr.AddEvent(item, &Item::removeFromRefundableMap, EVENT_REMOVE_ITEM_FROM_REFUNDABLE_MAP, (UNIXTIME + 60 * 60 * 2), 1, EVENT_FLAG_DO_NOT_EXECUTE_IN_WORLD_CONTEXT);
4045}

4091
4092/// Looks up an item in the RefundableMap, and returns the data
4093std::pair<time_t, uint32_t> ItemInterface::LookupRefundable(uint64_t GUID)
4094{
4095 std::pair<time_t, uint32_t> RefundableEntry;
4096 RefundableEntry.first = 0; // time of purchase in playedtime
4097 RefundableEntry.second = 0; // extendedcost
4098
4099 RefundableMap::iterator itr = this->m_refundableitems.find(GUID);
4100 if (itr != this->m_refundableitems.end())
4101 {
4102 RefundableEntry.first = itr->second.first;
4103 RefundableEntry.second = itr->second.second;
4104 }
4105
4106 return RefundableEntry;
4107}
4108
4109bool ItemInterface::AddItemById(uint32_t itemid, uint32_t count, int32_t randomprop)
4110{
4111 if (count == 0)
4112 return false;
4113
4114 Player* chr = GetOwner();
4115
4116 if (!chr)
4117 return false;
4118
4119 ItemProperties const* it = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(itemid);
4120 if (it == nullptr)
4121 return false;
4122
4123 int8_t error = CanReceiveItem(it, count);
4124 if (error != 0)
4125 {
4126 return false;
4127 }
4128
4129 uint32_t maxStack = chr->m_cheats.hasItemStackCheat ? 0x7fffffff : it->MaxCount;
4130 uint32_t toadd;
4131 bool freeslots = true;
4132
4133 while (count > 0 && freeslots)
4134 {
4135 if (count < maxStack)
4136 {
4137 // find existing item with free stack
4138 Item* free_stack_item = FindItemLessMax(itemid, count, false);
4139 if (free_stack_item != nullptr)
4140 {
4141 // increase stack by new amount
4142 free_stack_item->modStackCount(static_cast<int32_t>(count));
4143 free_stack_item->m_isDirty = true;
4144
4145 sQuestMgr.OnPlayerItemPickup(m_pOwner, free_stack_item);
4146
4147 return true;
4148 }
4149 }
4150
4151 // create new item
4152 auto itemHolder = sObjectMgr.createItem(itemid, chr);
4153 if (itemHolder == nullptr)
4154 return false;
4155
4156 if (it->Bonding == ITEM_BIND_ON_PICKUP)
4157 {
4158 if (it->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_ACCOUNTBOUND) // don't "Soulbind" account-bound items
4159 itemHolder->addFlags(ITEM_FLAG_ACCOUNTBOUND);
4160 else
4161 itemHolder->addFlags(ITEM_FLAG_SOULBOUND);
4162 }
4163
4164 // Let's try to autogenerate randomprop / randomsuffix
4165 if (randomprop == 0)
4166 {
4167
4168 if ((it->RandomPropId != 0) && (it->RandomSuffixId != 0))
4169 {
4170 sLogger.failure("Item {} ({}) has both RandomPropId and RandomSuffixId.", itemid, it->Name);
4171 }
4172
4173 if (it->RandomPropId != 0)
4174 {
4175 auto item_random_properties = sLootMgr.getRandomProperties(it);
4176
4177 if (item_random_properties != nullptr)
4178 {
4179 randomprop = static_cast<int32_t>(item_random_properties->ID);
4180 }
4181 else
4182 {
4183 sLogger.failure("Item {} ({}) has unknown RandomPropId {}", itemid, it->Name, it->RandomPropId);
4184 }
4185 }
4186
4187 if (it->RandomSuffixId != 0)
4188 {
4189 auto item_random_suffix = sLootMgr.getRandomSuffix(it);
4190
4191 if (item_random_suffix != nullptr)
4192 {
4193 randomprop = -1 * static_cast<int32_t>(item_random_suffix->id);
4194 }
4195 else
4196 {
4197 sLogger.failure("Item {} ({}) has unknown RandomSuffixId {}", itemid, it->Name, it->RandomSuffixId);
4198 }
4199 }
4200 }
4201
4202 if (randomprop != 0)
4203 {
4204 if (randomprop < 0)
4205 itemHolder->setRandomSuffix(static_cast<uint32_t>(-randomprop));
4206 else
4207 itemHolder->setRandomPropertiesId(static_cast<uint32_t>(randomprop));
4208
4209 itemHolder->applyRandomProperties(false);
4210 }
4211
4212 if (maxStack != 0)
4213 {
4214 toadd = count > maxStack ? maxStack : count;
4215 }
4216 else
4217 {
4218 toadd = count;
4219 }
4220
4221 itemHolder->setStackCount(toadd);
4222
4223 auto* item = itemHolder.get();
4224 const auto [res, _] = AddItemToFreeSlot(std::move(itemHolder));
4225 if (res == ADD_ITEM_RESULT_OK)
4226 {
4227 SlotResult* lr = LastSearchResult();
4228
4229 chr->sendItemPushResultPacket(false, true, false, lr->ContainerSlot, lr->Slot, toadd, item->getEntry(), item->getPropertySeed(), item->getRandomPropertiesId(), item->getStackCount());
4230#if VERSION_STRING > TBC
4231 chr->updateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_LOOT_ITEM, itemid, 1, 0);
4232#endif
4233 sQuestMgr.OnPlayerItemPickup(m_pOwner, item);
4234 count -= toadd;
4235 }
4236 else
4237 {
4238 freeslots = false;
4239 chr->getSession()->SendNotification("No free slots were found in your inventory!");
4240 }
4241 }
4242 return freeslots;
4243}
4244
4245
4246bool ItemInterface::SwapItems(int8_t DstInvSlot, int8_t DstSlot, int8_t SrcInvSlot, int8_t SrcSlot)
4247{
4248 Item* SrcItem = nullptr;
4249 Item* DstItem = nullptr;
4250 bool adderror = false;
4251 int8_t error;
4252
4253 if (DstInvSlot == SrcSlot && SrcInvSlot == -1) // player trying to add self container to self container slots
4254 {
4255 buildInventoryChangeError(nullptr, nullptr, INV_ERR_ITEMS_CANT_BE_SWAPPED);
4256 return false;
4257 }
4258
4259 if ((DstInvSlot <= 0 && DstSlot < 0) || DstInvSlot < -1)
4260 return false;
4261
4262 if ((SrcInvSlot <= 0 && SrcSlot < 0) || SrcInvSlot < -1)
4263 return false;
4264
4265 SrcItem = GetInventoryItem(SrcInvSlot, SrcSlot);
4266 if (!SrcItem)
4267 return false;
4268
4269 DstItem = GetInventoryItem(DstInvSlot, DstSlot);
4270
4271 if (DstItem)
4272 {
4273 //check if it will go to equipment slot
4274 if (SrcInvSlot == INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET) //not bag
4275 {
4276 if (DstItem->isContainer())
4277 {
4278 if (static_cast<Container*>(DstItem)->hasItems())
4279 {
4280 if (!IsBagSlot(SrcSlot))
4281 {
4282 buildInventoryChangeError(SrcItem, DstItem, INV_ERR_NONEMPTY_BAG_OVER_OTHER_BAG);
4283 return false;
4284 }
4285 }
4286 }
4287
4288 if (SrcSlot < INVENTORY_KEYRING_END)
4289 {
4290 if ((error = CanEquipItemInSlot2(SrcInvSlot, SrcSlot, DstItem)) != 0)
4291 {
4292 buildInventoryChangeError(SrcItem, DstItem, static_cast<uint8_t>(error));
4293 return false;
4294 }
4295 }
4296 }
4297 else
4298 {
4299 if (DstItem->isContainer())
4300 {
4301 if (static_cast<Container*>(DstItem)->hasItems())
4302 {
4303 buildInventoryChangeError(SrcItem, DstItem, INV_ERR_NONEMPTY_BAG_OVER_OTHER_BAG);
4304 return false;
4305 }
4306 }
4307
4308 if ((error = CanEquipItemInSlot2(SrcInvSlot, SrcInvSlot, DstItem)) != 0)
4309 {
4310 buildInventoryChangeError(SrcItem, DstItem, static_cast<uint8_t>(error));
4311 return false;
4312 }
4313 }
4314 }
4315
4316 if (DstInvSlot == INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET) //not bag
4317 {
4318 if (SrcItem->isContainer())
4319 {
4320 if (static_cast<Container*>(SrcItem)->hasItems())
4321 {
4322 if (!IsBagSlot(DstSlot))
4323 {
4324 buildInventoryChangeError(SrcItem, DstItem, INV_ERR_NONEMPTY_BAG_OVER_OTHER_BAG);
4325 return false;
4326 }
4327 }
4328 }
4329
4330 if (DstSlot < INVENTORY_KEYRING_END)
4331 {
4332 if ((error = CanEquipItemInSlot2(DstInvSlot, DstSlot, SrcItem)) != 0)
4333 {
4334 buildInventoryChangeError(SrcItem, DstItem, static_cast<uint8_t>(error));
4335 return false;
4336 }
4337 }
4338 }
4339 else
4340 {
4341 if (SrcItem->isContainer())
4342 {
4343 if (static_cast<Container*>(SrcItem)->hasItems())
4344 {
4345 buildInventoryChangeError(SrcItem, DstItem, INV_ERR_NONEMPTY_BAG_OVER_OTHER_BAG);
4346 return false;
4347 }
4348 }
4349
4350 if ((error = CanEquipItemInSlot2(DstInvSlot, DstInvSlot, SrcItem)) != 0)
4351 {
4352 buildInventoryChangeError(SrcItem, DstItem, static_cast<uint8_t>(error));
4353 return false;
4354 }
4355 }
4356
4357 if (DstSlot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END && DstInvSlot == INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET) //equip - bags can be soulbound too
4358 {
4359 if (SrcItem->getItemProperties()->Bonding == ITEM_BIND_ON_EQUIP)
4360 SrcItem->addFlags(ITEM_FLAG_SOULBOUND);
4361
4362#if VERSION_STRING > TBC
4363 m_pOwner->updateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EQUIP_ITEM, SrcItem->getItemProperties()->ItemId, 0, 0);
4364
4365 if (DstSlot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START) // check Superior/Epic achievement
4366 {
4367 // Achievement ID:556 description Equip an epic item in every slot with a minimum item level of 213.
4368 // "213" value not found in achievement or criteria entries, have to hard-code it here? :(
4369 // Achievement ID:557 description Equip a superior item in every slot with a minimum item level of 187.
4370 // "187" value not found in achievement or criteria entries, have to hard-code it here? :(
4371 if ((SrcItem->getItemProperties()->Quality == ITEM_QUALITY_RARE_BLUE && SrcItem->getItemProperties()->ItemLevel >= 187) ||
4372 (SrcItem->getItemProperties()->Quality == ITEM_QUALITY_EPIC_PURPLE && SrcItem->getItemProperties()->ItemLevel >= 213))
4373 m_pOwner->updateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EQUIP_EPIC_ITEM, DstSlot, SrcItem->getItemProperties()->Quality, 0);
4374 }
4375#endif
4376 }
4377
4378 if (DstItem && SrcSlot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END && SrcInvSlot == INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET) //equip - make sure to soulbind items swapped from equip slot to bag slot
4379 {
4380 if (DstItem->getItemProperties()->Bonding == ITEM_BIND_ON_EQUIP)
4381 DstItem->addFlags(ITEM_FLAG_SOULBOUND);
4382#if VERSION_STRING > TBC
4383 m_pOwner->updateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EQUIP_ITEM, DstItem->getItemProperties()->ItemId, 0, 0);
4384 if (SrcSlot < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START) // check Superior/Epic achievement
4385 {
4386 if ((DstItem->getItemProperties()->Quality == ITEM_QUALITY_RARE_BLUE && DstItem->getItemProperties()->ItemLevel >= 187) ||
4387 (DstItem->getItemProperties()->Quality == ITEM_QUALITY_EPIC_PURPLE && DstItem->getItemProperties()->ItemLevel >= 213))
4388 m_pOwner->updateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_EQUIP_EPIC_ITEM, SrcSlot, DstItem->getItemProperties()->Quality, 0);
4389 }
4390#endif
4391 }
4392
4393 if (SrcInvSlot == DstInvSlot) //in 1 bag
4394 {
4395 if (SrcInvSlot == INVENTORY_SLOT_NOT_SET) //in backpack
4396 {
4397 SwapItemSlots(SrcSlot, DstSlot);
4398 }
4399 else//in bag
4400 {
4401 static_cast<Container*>(GetInventoryItem(SrcInvSlot))->swapItems(SrcSlot, DstSlot);
4402 }
4403 }
4404 else
4405 {
4406 //Check for stacking
4407 uint32_t srcItemMaxStack = (SrcItem->getOwner()->m_cheats.hasItemStackCheat) ? 0x7fffffff : SrcItem->getItemProperties()->MaxCount;
4408 uint32_t dstItemMaxStack = (DstItem) ? ((DstItem->getOwner()->m_cheats.hasItemStackCheat) ? 0x7fffffff : DstItem->getItemProperties()->MaxCount) : 0;
4409 if (DstItem && SrcItem->getEntry() == DstItem->getEntry() && srcItemMaxStack > 1 && SrcItem->m_wrappedItemId == 0 && DstItem->m_wrappedItemId == 0)
4410 {
4411 uint32_t total = SrcItem->getStackCount() + DstItem->getStackCount();
4412 if (total <= dstItemMaxStack)
4413 {
4414 DstItem->modStackCount(SrcItem->getStackCount());
4415 DstItem->m_isDirty = true;
4416 bool result = SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(SrcInvSlot, SrcSlot);
4417 if (!result)
4418 {
4419 buildInventoryChangeError(SrcItem, DstItem, INV_ERR_ITEM_CANT_STACK);
4420 }
4421 return false;
4422 }
4423 else
4424 {
4425 if (DstItem->getStackCount() == dstItemMaxStack)
4426 {
4427
4428 }
4429 else
4430 {
4431 int32_t delta = dstItemMaxStack - DstItem->getStackCount();
4432 DstItem->setStackCount(dstItemMaxStack);
4433 SrcItem->modStackCount(-delta);
4434 SrcItem->m_isDirty = true;
4435 DstItem->m_isDirty = true;
4436 return false;
4437 }
4438 }
4439 }
4440
4441 auto srcItemHolder = SafeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot(SrcInvSlot, SrcSlot, false);
4442 auto dstItemHolder = DstItem != nullptr ? SafeRemoveAndRetreiveItemFromSlot(DstInvSlot, DstSlot, false) : nullptr;
4443
4444 if (srcItemHolder)
4445 {
4446 const auto [result, returnedItem] = SafeAddItem(std::move(srcItemHolder), DstInvSlot, DstSlot);
4447 if (!result)
4448 {
4449 // TODO: if add failed, should item be sent in mail to player? now it's destroyed -Appled
4450 sLogger.failure("HandleSwapItem: Error while adding item to dstslot");
4451 returnedItem->deleteFromDB();
4452 adderror = true;
4453 }
4454 }
4455
4456 if (dstItemHolder)
4457 {
4458 const auto [result, returnedItem] = SafeAddItem(std::move(dstItemHolder), SrcInvSlot, SrcSlot);
4459 if (!result)
4460 {
4461 // TODO: if add failed, should item be sent in mail to player? now it's destroyed -Appled
4462 sLogger.failure("HandleSwapItem: Error while adding item to srcslot");
4463 returnedItem->deleteFromDB();
4464 adderror = true;
4465 }
4466 }
4467 }
4468
4469 //Recalculate Expertise (for Weapon specs)
4470 m_pOwner->calcExpertise();
4471
4472 if (adderror)
4473 return false;
4474 else
4475 return true;
4476}
4477
4478void ItemInterface::removeLootableItems()
4479{
4480 for (uint8_t i = INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
4481 {
4482 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(i);
4483 if (item == nullptr)
4484 continue;
4485
4486 if (item->m_loot != nullptr)
4487 SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(-1, i);
4488 }
4489
4490 for (uint8_t i = BANK_SLOT_ITEM_START; i < BANK_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++i)
4491 {
4492 Item* item = GetInventoryItem(i);
4493 if (item == nullptr)
4494 continue;
4495
4496 if (item->m_loot != nullptr)
4497 SafeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(-1, i);
4498 }
4499
4500 for (uint8_t i = INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_START; i < INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
4501 {
4502 Container* container = dynamic_cast<Container*>(GetInventoryItem(i));
4503 if (container == nullptr)
4504 continue;
4505
4506 uint8_t s = static_cast<uint8_t>(container->getSlotCount());
4507 for (uint8_t j = 0; j < s; j++)
4508 {
4509 Item* item = container->getItem(j);
4510 if (item == nullptr)
4511 continue;
4512
4513 if (item->m_loot != nullptr)
4514 container->safeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(j);
4515 }
4516 }
4517
4518 for (uint8_t i = BANK_SLOT_BAG_START; i < BANK_SLOT_BAG_END; ++i)
4519 {
4520 Container* container = dynamic_cast<Container*>(GetInventoryItem(i));
4521 if (container == nullptr)
4522 continue;
4523
4524 uint8_t s = static_cast<uint8_t>(container->getSlotCount());
4525 for (uint8_t j = 0; j < s; ++j)
4526 {
4527 Item* item = container->getItem(j);
4528 if (item == nullptr)
4529 continue;
4530
4531 if (item->m_loot != nullptr)
4532 container->safeFullRemoveItemFromSlot(j);
4533 }
4534 }
4535}
4536
4537void ItemIterator::Increment()
4538{
4539 if (!m_searchInProgress)
4540 BeginSearch();
4541
4542 /// check: are we currently inside a container?
4543 if (m_container != nullptr)
4544 {
4545 /// loop the container.
4546 for (; m_containerSlot < m_container->getItemProperties()->ContainerSlots; ++m_containerSlot)
4547 {
4548 m_currentItem = m_container->getItem(static_cast<int16_t>(m_containerSlot));
4549 if (m_currentItem != nullptr)
4550 {
4551 ++m_containerSlot; /// increment the counter so we don't get the same item again
4552
4553 return;
4554 }
4555 }
4556
4557 m_container = nullptr; /// unset this
4558 }
4559
4560 for (; m_slot < MAX_INVENTORY_SLOT; ++m_slot)
4561 {
4562 if (m_target->m_pItems[m_slot])
4563 {
4564 if (m_target->m_pItems[m_slot]->isContainer())
4565 {
4566 m_container = static_cast<Container*>(m_target->m_pItems[m_slot].get()); /// we are a container :O lets look inside the box!
4567 m_containerSlot = 0;
4568 m_currentItem = nullptr; /// clear the pointer up. so we can tell if we found an item or not
4569 ++m_slot; /// increment m_slot so we don't search this container again
4570
4571 Increment(); /// call increment() recursively. this will search the container.
4572
4573 return; /// jump out so we're not wasting cycles and skipping items
4574 }
4575
4576
4577 m_currentItem = m_target->m_pItems[m_slot].get(); /// we're not a container, just a regular item. Set the pointer
4578 ++m_slot; /// increment the slot counter so we don't do the same item again
4579
4580 return; /// jump out
4581 }
4582 }
4583
4584 /// if we're here we've searched all items.
4585 m_atEnd = true;
4586 m_currentItem = nullptr;
4587}
